   20: -module(gen_sctp_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: -include_lib("kernel/include/inet_sctp.hrl").
   24: -include("kernel_test_lib.hrl").
   25: 
   26: %%-compile(export_all).
   27: 
   28: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0,
   29: 	 init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   30: 	 init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   31: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   32: -export([
   33:          skip_old_solaris/1,
   34:          basic/1,
   35:          api_open_close/1,api_listen/1,api_connect_init/1,api_connectx_init/1,api_opts/1,
   36:          xfer_min/1,xfer_active/1,def_sndrcvinfo/1,implicit_inet6/1,
   37:          open_multihoming_ipv4_socket/1,
   38:          open_unihoming_ipv6_socket/1,
   39:          open_multihoming_ipv6_socket/1,
   40:          open_multihoming_ipv4_and_ipv6_socket/1,
   41:          basic_stream/1, xfer_stream_min/1, active_n/1,
   42:          peeloff_active_once/1, peeloff_active_true/1, peeloff_active_n/1,
   43:          buffers/1, send_block/1,
   44:          names_unihoming_ipv4/1, names_unihoming_ipv6/1,
   45:          names_multihoming_ipv4/1, names_multihoming_ipv6/1,
   46:          recv_close/1,
   47: 
   48:          t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv/1,
   49:          t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv/1,
   50:          t_simple_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv/1,
   51:          t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv/1,
   52:          t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_connectx_init/1
   53:         ]).
   54: 
   55: suite() ->
   56:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   57:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   58: 
   59: all() ->
   60:     G = case is_old_solaris() of
   61: 	    true -> old_solaris;
   62: 	    false -> extensive
   63: 	end,
   64:     [
   65:      {group, smoke},
   66:      {group, G},
   67:      {group, sockaddr}].
   68: 
   69: groups() -> 
   70:     [
   71:      {smoke,       [], smoke_cases()},
   72:      {old_solaris, [], old_solaris_cases()},
   73:      {extensive,   [], extensive_cases()},
   74: 
   75:      {sockaddr,    [], sockaddr_cases()}
   76:     ].
   77: 
   78: smoke_cases() ->
   79:     [
   80:      basic,
   81:      basic_stream
   82:     ].
   83: 
   84: old_solaris_cases() ->
   85:     [
   86:      skip_old_solaris
   87:     ].
   88: 
   89: extensive_cases() ->
   90:     [
   91:      api_open_close, api_listen, api_connect_init, api_connectx_init,
   92:      api_opts, xfer_min, xfer_active, def_sndrcvinfo, implicit_inet6,
   93:      open_multihoming_ipv4_socket,
   94:      open_unihoming_ipv6_socket,
   95:      open_multihoming_ipv6_socket,
   96:      open_multihoming_ipv4_and_ipv6_socket, active_n,
   97:      xfer_stream_min, peeloff_active_once,
   98:      peeloff_active_true, peeloff_active_n, buffers, send_block,
   99:      names_unihoming_ipv4, names_unihoming_ipv6,
  100:      names_multihoming_ipv4, names_multihoming_ipv6,
  101:      recv_close
  102:     ].
  103: 
  104: sockaddr_cases() ->
  105:     [
  106:      t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv,
  107:      t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv,
  108:      t_simple_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv,
  109:      t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv,
  110:      t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_connectx_init
  111:     ].
  112: 
  113: 
  114: %% This (Config) was ignored before, why?
  115: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  116: 
  117:     ?P("init_per_suite -> entry with"
  118:        "~n      Config: ~p"
  119:        "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  120: 
  121:     case gen_sctp:open() of
  122: 	{ok, Socket} ->
  123: 	    gen_sctp:close(Socket),
  124: 
  125:             case ?LIB:init_per_suite(Config0) of
  126:                 {skip, _} = SKIP ->
  127:                     SKIP;
  128: 
  129:                 Config1 when is_list(Config1) ->
  130: 
  131:                     ?P("init_per_suite -> end when "
  132:                        "~n      Config: ~p", [Config1]),
  133: 
  134:                     %% We need a monitor on this node also
  135:                     kernel_test_sys_monitor:start(),
  136: 
  137:                     Config1
  138:             end;
  139: 
  140: 	{error, Error}
  141: 	  when Error =:= eprotonosupport;
  142: 	       Error =:= esocktnosupport ->
  143: 	    {skip,"SCTP not supported on this machine"}
  144:     end.
  145: 
  146: end_per_suite(Config0) ->
  147: 
  148:     ?P("end_per_suite -> entry with"
  149:        "~n      Config: ~p"
  150:        "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  151: 
  152:     %% Stop the local monitor
  153:     kernel_test_sys_monitor:stop(),
  154: 
  155:     Config1 = ?LIB:end_per_suite(Config0),
  156: 
  157:     ?P("end_per_suite -> "
  158:        "~n      Nodes: ~p", [erlang:nodes()]),
  159: 
  160:     Config1.
  161: 
  162: init_per_group(sockaddr = _GroupName, Config) ->
  163:     ?P("init_per_group(sockaddr) -> do we support 'socket'"),
  164:     try socket:info() of
  165: 	_ ->
  166:             ?P("init_per_group(sockaddr) -> we support 'socket'"),
  167:             Config
  168:     catch
  169:         error : notsup ->
  170:             ?P("init_per_group(sockaddr) -> we *do not* support 'socket'"),
  171:             {skip, "esock not supported"};
  172:         error : undef ->
  173:             ?P("init_per_group(sockaddr) -> 'socket' not configured"),
  174:             {skip, "esock not configured"}
  175:     end;
  176: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  177:     Config.
  178: 
  179: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  180:     Config.
  181: 
  182: 
  183: init_per_testcase(api_connectx_init = Case, Config) ->
  184:     check_sctp_connectx(Case, Config);
  185: init_per_testcase(t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_connectx_init = Case, Config) ->
  186:     check_sctp_connectx(Case, Config);
  187: init_per_testcase(names_multihoming_ipv4 = Case, Config) ->
  188:     case lists:keylookup(label, 1, Config) of
  189:         {value, {label, docker}} ->
  190:             {skip, "Unstable/broken on docker"};
  191:         _ ->
  192:             init_per_testcase_common(Case, Config)
  193:     end;
  194: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  195:     init_per_testcase_common(Case, Config).
  196:     
  197: init_per_testcase_common(_Case, Config) ->
  198: 
  199:     ?P("init_per_testcase -> entry with"
  200:        "~n   Config:   ~p"
  201:        "~n   Nodes:    ~p"
  202:        "~n   Links:    ~p"
  203:        "~n   Monitors: ~p",
  204:        [Config, erlang:nodes(), pi(links), pi(monitors)]),
  205: 
  206:     kernel_test_global_sys_monitor:reset_events(),
  207: 
  208:     ?P("init_per_testcase -> done when"
  209:        "~n   Nodes:    ~p"
  210:        "~n   Links:    ~p"
  211:        "~n   Monitors: ~p", [erlang:nodes(), pi(links), pi(monitors)]),
  212: 
  213:     Config.
  214: 
  215: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  216:     ?P("end_per_testcase -> entry with"
  217:        "~n   Config:   ~p"
  218:        "~n   Nodes:    ~p"
  219:        "~n   Links:    ~p"
  220:        "~n   Monitors: ~p",
  221:        [Config, erlang:nodes(), pi(links), pi(monitors)]),
  222: 
  223:     ?P("system events during test: "
  224:        "~n   ~p", [kernel_test_global_sys_monitor:events()]),
  225: 
  226:     ?P("end_per_testcase -> done with"
  227:        "~n   Nodes:    ~p"
  228:        "~n   Links:    ~p"
  229:        "~n   Monitors: ~p", [erlang:nodes(), pi(links), pi(monitors)]),
  230:     ok.
  231: 
  232: 
  233: -define(LOGVAR(Var), begin io:format(??Var" = ~p~n", [Var]), Var end).
  234: -define(no_return(Expr), error({unexpected, Expr})).
  235: 
  236: check_sctp_connectx(Case, Config) ->
  237:     {ok,S} = gen_sctp:open([]),
  238:     try
  239:         {ok,Pb} = inet:port(S),
  240:         case gen_sctp:connectx_init(S, [{127,0,0,1}], Pb, []) of
  241:             {error, enotsup} ->
  242:                 {skip, "sctp_connectx unsupported"};
  243:             _ ->
  244:                 init_per_testcase_common(Case, Config)
  245:         end
  246:     after
  247:         gen_sctp:close(S)
  248:     end.
  249: 
  250: is_old_solaris() ->
  251:     os:type() =:= {unix,sunos} andalso os:version() < {5,12,0}.
  252: 
  253: skip_old_solaris(_Config) ->
  254:     {skip,"Unreliable test cases and/or implementation on old Solaris"}.
  255: 
  256: %% Hello world.
  257: basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  258:     {ok,S} = gen_sctp:open(),
  259:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S),
  260:     ok.
  261: 
  262: %% Minimal data transfer.
  263: xfer_min(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  264:     Stream = 0,
  265:     Data = <<"The quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog 0123456789">>,
  266:     Loopback = {127,0,0,1},
  267:     StatOpts =
  268: 	[recv_avg,recv_cnt,recv_max,recv_oct,
  269: 	 send_avg,send_cnt,send_max,send_oct],
  270:     {ok,Sb} = gen_sctp:open([{type,seqpacket}]),
  271:     {ok,SbStat1} = inet:getstat(Sb, StatOpts),
  272:     {ok,Pb} = inet:port(Sb),
  273:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sb, true),
  274: 
  275:     {ok,Sa} = gen_sctp:open(),
  276:     {ok,Pa} = inet:port(Sa),
  277:     {ok,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
  278: 			   error=0,
  279: 			   outbound_streams=SaOutboundStreams,
  280: 			   inbound_streams=SaInboundStreams,
  281: 			   assoc_id=SaAssocId}=SaAssocChange} =
  282: 	gen_sctp:connect(Sa, Loopback, Pb, []),
  283:     {SbAssocId,SaOutboundStreams,SaInboundStreams} =
  284: 	case recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))) of
  285: 	    {Loopback,Pa,
  286: 	     #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
  287: 				error=0,
  288: 				outbound_streams=SbOutboundStreams,
  289: 				inbound_streams=SbInboundStreams,
  290: 				assoc_id=AssocId}} ->
  291: 		{AssocId,SbInboundStreams,SbOutboundStreams};
  292: 	    {Loopback,Pa,
  293: 	     #sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_confirmed,
  294: 				addr={Loopback,Pa},
  295: 				error=0,
  296: 				assoc_id=AssocId}} ->
  297: 		{Loopback,Pa,
  298: 		 #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
  299: 				    error=0,
  300: 				    outbound_streams=SbOutboundStreams,
  301: 				    inbound_streams=SbInboundStreams,
  302: 				    assoc_id=AssocId}} =
  303: 		    recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))),
  304: 		{AssocId,SbInboundStreams,SbOutboundStreams}
  305: 	end,
  306: 
  307:     ok = gen_sctp:send(Sa, SaAssocId, 0, Data),
  308:     case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity)) of
  309: 	{Loopback,
  310: 	 Pa,
  311: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream   = Stream,
  312: 			   assoc_id = SbAssocId}],
  313: 	 Data} -> ok;
  314: 	Event1 ->
  315: 	    case recv_event(Event1) of
  316: 		{Loopback,Pa,
  317: 		 #sctp_paddr_change{addr = {Loopback,_},
  318: 				    state = State,
  319: 				    error = 0,
  320: 				    assoc_id = SbAssocId}}
  321: 		  when State =:= addr_available;
  322: 		       State =:= addr_confirmed ->
  323: 		    {Loopback,
  324: 		     Pa,
  325: 		     [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,
  326: 				       assoc_id=SbAssocId}],
  327: 		     Data} = log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))
  328: 	    end
  329:     end,
  330:     ok = gen_sctp:send(Sb, SbAssocId, 0, Data),
  331:     case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity)) of
  332: 	{Loopback,Pb,
  333: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,
  334: 			   assoc_id=SaAssocId}],
  335: 	 Data} ->
  336: 	    ok;
  337: 	Event2 ->
  338: 	    {Loopback,Pb,
  339: 	     #sctp_paddr_change{addr={_,Pb},
  340: 				state=addr_confirmed,
  341: 				error=0,
  342: 				assoc_id=SaAssocId}} =
  343: 		recv_event(Event2),
  344: 	    {Loopback,
  345: 	     Pb,
  346: 	     [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,
  347: 			       assoc_id=SaAssocId}],
  348: 	     Data} =
  349: 		log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity))
  350:     end,
  351:     %%
  352:     ok = gen_sctp:eof(Sa, SaAssocChange),
  353:     {Loopback,Pa,#sctp_shutdown_event{assoc_id=SbAssocId}} =
  354: 	recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))),
  355:     {Loopback,Pb,
  356:      #sctp_assoc_change{state=shutdown_comp,
  357: 			error=0,
  358: 			assoc_id=SaAssocId}} =
  359: 	recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity))),
  360:     {Loopback,Pa,
  361:      #sctp_assoc_change{state=shutdown_comp,
  362: 			error=0,
  363: 			assoc_id=SbAssocId}} =
  364: 	recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))),
  365:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sa),
  366:     {ok,SbStat2} = inet:getstat(Sb, StatOpts),
  367:     [] = filter_stat_eq(SbStat1, SbStat2),
  368:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sb),
  369: 
  370:     receive
  371: 	Msg -> ct:fail({received,Msg})
  372:     after 17 -> ok
  373:     end,
  374:     ok.
  375: 
  376: filter_stat_eq([], []) ->
  377:     [];
  378: filter_stat_eq([{Tag,Val1}=Stat|SbStat1], [{Tag,Val2}|SbStat2]) ->
  379:     if
  380: 	Val1 == Val2 ->
  381: 	    [Stat|filter_stat_eq(SbStat1, SbStat2)];
  382: 	true ->
  383: 	    filter_stat_eq(SbStat1, SbStat2)
  384:     end.
  385: 
  386: 
  387: 
  388: %% Minimal data transfer in active mode.
  389: xfer_active(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  390:     Timeout = 2000,
  391:     Stream = 0,
  392:     Data = <<"The quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog 0123456789">>,
  393:     Loopback = {127,0,0,1},
  394:     {ok,Sb} = gen_sctp:open([{active,true}]),
  395:     {ok,Pb} = inet:port(Sb),
  396:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sb, true),
  397: 
  398:     {ok,Sa} = gen_sctp:open([{active,true}]),
  399:     {ok,Pa} = inet:port(Sa),
  400:     ok = gen_sctp:connect_init(Sa, Loopback, Pb, []),
  401:     #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
  402: 		       error=0,
  403: 		       outbound_streams=SaOutboundStreams,
  404: 		       inbound_streams=SaInboundStreams,
  405: 		       assoc_id=SaAssocId} = SaAssocChange =
  406: 	recv_assoc_change(Sa, Loopback, Pb, Timeout),
  407:     io:format("Sa=~p, Pa=~p, Sb=~p, Pb=~p, SaAssocId=~p, "
  408: 	      "SaOutboundStreams=~p, SaInboundStreams=~p~n",
  409: 	      [Sa,Pa,Sb,Pb,SaAssocId,
  410: 	       SaOutboundStreams,SaInboundStreams]),
  411:     #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
  412: 		       error=0,
  413: 		       outbound_streams=SbOutboundStreams,
  414: 		       inbound_streams=SbInboundStreams,
  415: 		       assoc_id=SbAssocId} =
  416: 	recv_assoc_change(Sb, Loopback, Pa, Timeout),
  417:     SbOutboundStreams = SaInboundStreams,
  418:     SbInboundStreams = SaOutboundStreams,
  419:     io:format("SbAssocId=~p~n", [SbAssocId]),
  420: 
  421:     case recv_paddr_change(Sa, Loopback, Pb, 314) of
  422: 	#sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_confirmed,
  423: 			   addr={_,Pb},
  424: 			   error=0,
  425: 			   assoc_id=SaAssocId} -> ok;
  426: 	#sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_available,
  427: 			   addr={_,Pb},
  428: 			   error=0,
  429: 			   assoc_id=SaAssocId} -> ok;
  430: 	timeout -> ok
  431:     end,
  432:     case recv_paddr_change(Sb, Loopback, Pa, 314) of
  433: 	#sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_confirmed,
  434: 			   addr={Loopback,Pa},
  435: 			   error=0,
  436: 			   assoc_id=SbAssocId} -> ok;
  437: 	#sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_available,
  438: 			   addr={Loopback,P},
  439: 			   error=0,
  440: 			   assoc_id=SbAssocId} ->
  441: 	    match_unless_solaris(Pa, P);
  442: 	timeout -> ok
  443:     end,
  444:     [] = flush(),
  445: 
  446:     ok =
  447: 	do_from_other_process(
  448: 	  fun () -> gen_sctp:send(Sa, SaAssocId, 0, Data) end),
  449:     receive
  450: 	{sctp,Sb,Loopback,Pa,
  451: 	 {[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,
  452: 			    assoc_id=SbAssocId}],
  453: 	  Data}} -> ok
  454:     after Timeout ->
  455: 	    ct:fail({timeout,flush()})
  456:     end,
  457:     ok = gen_sctp:send(Sb, SbAssocId, 0, Data),
  458:     receive
  459: 	{sctp,Sa,Loopback,Pb,
  460: 	 {[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,
  461: 			    assoc_id=SaAssocId}],
  462: 	  Data}} -> ok
  463:     after Timeout ->
  464: 	    ct:fail({timeout,flush()})
  465:     end,
  466:     %%
  467:     ok = gen_sctp:abort(Sa, SaAssocChange),
  468:     case recv_assoc_change(Sb, Loopback, Pa, Timeout) of
  469: 	#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_lost,
  470: 			   assoc_id=SbAssocId} -> ok;
  471: 	timeout ->
  472: 	    ct:fail({timeout,flush()})
  473:     end,
  474:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sb),
  475:     case recv_assoc_change(Sa, Loopback, Pb, Timeout) of
  476: 	#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_lost,
  477: 			   assoc_id=SaAssocId} -> ok;
  478: 	timeout ->
  479: 	    io:format("timeout waiting for comm_lost on Sa~n"),
  480: 	    match_unless_solaris(ok, {timeout,flush()})
  481:     end,
  482:     receive
  483: 	{sctp_error,Sa,enotconn} -> ok % Solaris
  484:     after 17 -> ok
  485:     end,
  486:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sa),
  487:     %%
  488:     receive
  489: 	Msg -> ct:fail({unexpected,[Msg]++flush()})
  490:     after 17 -> ok
  491:     end,
  492:     ok.
  493: 
  494: recv_assoc_change(S, Addr, Port, Timeout) ->
  495:     receive
  496: 	{sctp,S,Addr,Port,{[], #sctp_assoc_change{}=AssocChange}} ->
  497: 	    AssocChange;
  498: 	{sctp,S,Addr,Port,
  499: 	 {[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=AssocId}],
  500: 	  #sctp_assoc_change{assoc_id=AssocId}=AssocChange}} ->
  501: 	    AssocChange
  502:     after Timeout ->
  503: 	    timeout
  504:     end.
  505: 
  506: recv_paddr_change(S, Addr, Port, Timeout) ->
  507:     receive
  508: 	{sctp,S,Addr,Port,{[], #sctp_paddr_change{}=PaddrChange}} ->
  509: 	    PaddrChange;
  510: 	{sctp,S,Addr,Port,
  511: 	 {[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=AssocId}],
  512: 	  #sctp_paddr_change{assoc_id=AssocId}=PaddrChange}} ->
  513: 	    PaddrChange
  514:     after Timeout ->
  515: 	    timeout
  516:     end.
  517: 
  518: %% Test that #sctp_sndrcvinfo{} parameters set on a socket
  519: %% are used by gen_sctp:send/4.
  520: def_sndrcvinfo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  521:     Loopback = {127,0,0,1},
  522:     Data = <<"What goes up, must come down.">>,
  523:     %%
  524:     S1 =
  525: 	log_ok(gen_sctp:open(
  526: 		 0, [{sctp_default_send_param,#sctp_sndrcvinfo{ppid=17}}])),
  527:     ?LOGVAR(S1),
  528:     P1 =
  529: 	log_ok(inet:port(S1)),
  530:     ?LOGVAR(P1),
  531:     #sctp_sndrcvinfo{ppid=17, context=0, timetolive=0, assoc_id=0} =
  532: 	getopt(S1, sctp_default_send_param),
  533:     ok =
  534: 	gen_sctp:listen(S1, true),
  535:     %%
  536:     S2 =
  537: 	log_ok(gen_sctp:open()),
  538:     ?LOGVAR(S2),
  539:     P2 =
  540: 	log_ok(inet:port(S2)),
  541:     ?LOGVAR(P2),
  542:     #sctp_sndrcvinfo{ppid=0, context=0, timetolive=0, assoc_id=0} =
  543: 	getopt(S2, sctp_default_send_param),
  544:     %%
  545:     #sctp_assoc_change{
  546:        state=comm_up,
  547:        error=0,
  548:        assoc_id=S2AssocId} = S2AssocChange =
  549: 	log_ok(gen_sctp:connect(S2, Loopback, P1, [])),
  550:     ?LOGVAR(S2AssocChange),
  551:     S1AssocId =
  552: 	case recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(S1))) of
  553: 	    {Loopback,P2,
  554: 	     #sctp_assoc_change{
  555: 		state=comm_up,
  556: 		error=0,
  557: 		assoc_id=AssocId}} ->
  558: 		AssocId;
  559: 	    {Loopback,P2,
  560: 	     #sctp_paddr_change{
  561: 		state=addr_confirmed,
  562: 		error=0,
  563: 		assoc_id=AssocId}} ->
  564: 		{Loopback,P2,
  565: 		 #sctp_assoc_change{
  566: 		    state=comm_up,
  567: 		    error=0,
  568: 		    assoc_id=AssocId}} =
  569: 		    recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(S1))),
  570: 		AssocId
  571: 	end,
  572:     ?LOGVAR(S1AssocId),
  573: 
  574:     #sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  575:        ppid=17, context=0, timetolive=0} = %, assoc_id=S1AssocId} =
  576: 	getopt(
  577: 	  S1, sctp_default_send_param, #sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=S1AssocId}),
  578:     #sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  579:        ppid=0, context=0, timetolive=0} = %, assoc_id=S2AssocId} =
  580: 	getopt(
  581: 	  S2, sctp_default_send_param, #sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=S2AssocId}),
  582:     %%
  583:     ok =
  584: 	gen_sctp:send(S1, S1AssocId, 1, <<"1: ",Data/binary>>),
  585:     case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(S2)) of
  586: 	{Loopback,P1,
  587: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  588: 	     stream=1, ppid=17, context=0, assoc_id=S2AssocId}],
  589: 	 <<"1: ",Data/binary>>} -> ok;
  590: 	Event1 ->
  591: 	    {Loopback,P1,
  592: 	     #sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_confirmed,
  593: 				addr={_,P1},
  594: 				error=0,
  595: 				assoc_id=S2AssocId}} =
  596: 		recv_event(Event1),
  597: 	    {Loopback,P1,
  598: 	     [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  599: 		 stream=1, ppid=17, context=0, assoc_id=S2AssocId}],
  600: 	     <<"1: ",Data/binary>>} =
  601: 		log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(S2))
  602:     end,
  603:     %%
  604:     ok =
  605: 	setopt(
  606: 	  S1, sctp_default_send_param, #sctp_sndrcvinfo{ppid=18}),
  607:     ok =
  608: 	setopt(
  609: 	  S1, sctp_default_send_param,
  610: 	  #sctp_sndrcvinfo{ppid=19, assoc_id=S1AssocId}),
  611:     #sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  612:        ppid=18, context=0, timetolive=0, assoc_id=0} =
  613: 	getopt(S1, sctp_default_send_param),
  614:     #sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  615:        ppid=19, context=0, timetolive=0, assoc_id=S1AssocId} =
  616: 	getopt(
  617: 	  S1, sctp_default_send_param, #sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=S1AssocId}),
  618:     %%
  619:     ok =
  620: 	gen_sctp:send(S1, S1AssocId, 0, <<"2: ",Data/binary>>),
  621:     case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(S2)) of
  622: 	{Loopback,P1,
  623: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  624: 	     stream=0, ppid=19, context=0, assoc_id=S2AssocId}],
  625: 	 <<"2: ",Data/binary>>} -> ok
  626:     end,
  627:     ok =
  628: 	gen_sctp:send(S2, S2AssocChange, 1, <<"3: ",Data/binary>>),
  629:     case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(S1)) of
  630: 	{Loopback,P2,
  631: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  632: 	     stream=1, ppid=0, context=0, assoc_id=S1AssocId}],
  633: 	 <<"3: ",Data/binary>>} -> ok;
  634: 	Event2 ->
  635: 	    case recv_event(Event2) of
  636: 		{Loopback,P2,
  637: 		 #sctp_paddr_change{
  638: 		    addr={Loopback,_},
  639: 		    state=State,
  640: 		    error=0, assoc_id=S1AssocId}}
  641: 		  when State =:= addr_available;
  642: 		       State =:= addr_confirmed ->
  643: 		    case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(S1)) of
  644: 			{Loopback,P2,
  645: 			 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  646: 			     stream=1, ppid=0, context=0,
  647: 			     assoc_id=S1AssocId}],
  648: 			 <<"3: ",Data/binary>>} -> ok
  649: 		    end
  650: 	    end
  651:     end,
  652:     ok =
  653: 	do_from_other_process(
  654: 	  fun () ->
  655: 		  gen_sctp:send(
  656: 		    S2,
  657: 		    #sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=0, ppid=20, assoc_id=S2AssocId},
  658: 		    <<"4: ",Data/binary>>)
  659: 	  end),
  660:     case log_ok(do_from_other_process(fun() -> gen_sctp:recv(S1) end)) of
  661: 	{Loopback,P2,
  662: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{
  663: 	     stream=0, ppid=20, context=0, assoc_id=S1AssocId}],
  664: 	 <<"4: ",Data/binary>>} -> ok
  665:     end,
  666:     %%
  667:     ok =
  668: 	gen_sctp:close(S1),
  669:     ok =
  670: 	gen_sctp:close(S2),
  671:     receive
  672: 	Msg ->
  673: 	    ct:fail({received,Msg})
  674:     after 17 -> ok
  675:     end,
  676:     ok.
  677: 
  678: getopt(S, Opt) ->
  679:     {ok,[{Opt,Val}]} = inet:getopts(S, [Opt]),
  680:     Val.
  681: 
  682: getopt(S, Opt, Param) ->
  683:     {ok,[{Opt,Val}]} = inet:getopts(S, [{Opt,Param}]),
  684:     Val.
  685: 
  686: setopt(S, Opt, Val) ->
  687:     inet:setopts(S, [{Opt,Val}]).
  688: 
  689: 
  690: flush() ->
  691:     receive
  692: 	Msg ->
  693: 	    [Msg|flush()]
  694:     after 17 ->
  695: 	    []
  696:     end.
  697: 
  698: %% Test the API function open/1,2 and close/1.
  699: api_open_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  700:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, fun() -> do_api_open_close() end).
  701: 
  702: do_api_open_close() ->
  703:     {ok,S1} = gen_sctp:open(0),
  704:     {ok,P}  = inet:port(S1),
  705:     ok      = gen_sctp:close(S1),
  706: 
  707:     {ok,S2} = gen_sctp:open(P),
  708:     {ok,P}  = inet:port(S2),
  709:     ok      = gen_sctp:close(S2),
  710: 
  711:     {ok,S3} = gen_sctp:open([{port,P}]),
  712:     {ok,P}  = inet:port(S3),
  713:     ok      = gen_sctp:close(S3),
  714: 
  715:     {ok,S4} = gen_sctp:open(P, []),
  716:     {ok,P}  = inet:port(S4),
  717:     ok      = gen_sctp:close(S4),
  718: 
  719:     {ok,S5} = gen_sctp:open(P, [{debug, false}, {ifaddr,any}, {debug, true}]),
  720:     {ok,P}  = inet:port(S5),
  721:     ok      = gen_sctp:close(S5),
  722: 
  723:     ok      = gen_sctp:close(S5),
  724: 
  725:     try gen_sctp:close(0)
  726:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  727:     end,
  728: 
  729:     try gen_sctp:open({})
  730:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  731:     end,
  732: 
  733:     try gen_sctp:open(-1)
  734:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  735:     end,
  736: 
  737:     try gen_sctp:open(65536)
  738:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  739:     end,
  740: 
  741:     try gen_sctp:open(make_ref(), [])
  742:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  743:     end,
  744: 
  745:     try gen_sctp:open(0, {})
  746:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  747:     end,
  748: 
  749:     try gen_sctp:open(0, [make_ref()])
  750:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  751:     end,
  752: 
  753:     try gen_sctp:open([{invalid_option,0}])
  754:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  755:     end,
  756: 
  757:     try gen_sctp:open(0, [{mode,invalid_mode}])
  758:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  759:     end,
  760:     ok.
  761: 
  762: %% Test the API function listen/2.
  763: api_listen(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  764:     Localhost = {127,0,0,1},
  765: 
  766:     try gen_sctp:listen(0, true)
  767:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  768:     end,
  769: 
  770:     {ok,S} = gen_sctp:open(),
  771:     {ok,Pb} = inet:port(S),
  772:     try gen_sctp:listen(S, not_allowed_for_listen)
  773:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  774:     end,
  775:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S),
  776:     {error,closed} = gen_sctp:listen(S, true),
  777: 
  778:     {ok,Sb} = gen_sctp:open(Pb),
  779:     {ok,Sa} = gen_sctp:open(),
  780: 
  781:     element(1, os:type()) =:= unix andalso
  782:         begin
  783:             {error, nxdomain} = gen_sctp:connect(Sa, "", 65535, []),
  784:             {error, nxdomain} = gen_sctp:connect(Sa, '', 65535, [])
  785:         end,
  786:     {error, nxdomain} = gen_sctp:connect(Sa, ".", 65535, []),
  787:     {error, nxdomain} = gen_sctp:connect(Sa, '.', 65535, []),
  788: 
  789:     case gen_sctp:connect(Sa, localhost, Pb, []) of
  790: 	{error,econnrefused} ->
  791: 	    {ok,{Localhost,
  792: 		 Pb,[],
  793: 		 #sctp_assoc_change{
  794: 		    state=comm_lost}}} =
  795: 		gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity);
  796: 	{error,#sctp_assoc_change{state=cant_assoc}} ->
  797: 	    ok%;
  798: 	    %% {error,{Localhost,Pb,_,#sctp_assoc_change{state=cant_assoc}}} ->
  799: 	    %% 	  ok
  800:     end,
  801:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sb, true),
  802:     {ok,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
  803: 			   error=0}} =
  804: 	gen_sctp:connect(Sa, localhost, Pb, []),
  805:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sa),
  806:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sb),
  807:     ok.
  808: 
  809: %% Test the API function connect_init/4.
  810: api_connect_init(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  811:     Localhost = {127,0,0,1},
  812: 
  813:     {ok,S} = gen_sctp:open(),
  814:     {ok,Pb} = inet:port(S),
  815:     try gen_sctp:connect_init(S, Localhost, not_allowed_for_port, [])
  816:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  817:     end,
  818:     try gen_sctp:connect_init(S, Localhost, 12345, not_allowed_for_opts)
  819:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  820:     end,
  821:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S),
  822:     {error,closed} = gen_sctp:connect_init(S, Localhost, 12345, []),
  823: 
  824:     {ok,Sb} = gen_sctp:open(Pb),
  825:     {ok,Sa} = gen_sctp:open(),
  826:     case gen_sctp:connect_init(Sa, localhost, Pb, []) of
  827: 	{error,econnrefused} ->
  828: 	    {Localhost,Pb,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_lost}} =
  829: 		recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity)));
  830: 	ok ->
  831: 	    {Localhost,Pb,#sctp_assoc_change{state=cant_assoc}} =
  832: 		recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity)))
  833:     end,
  834:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sb, true),
  835:     case gen_sctp:connect_init(Sa, localhost, Pb, []) of
  836: 	ok ->
  837: 	    {Localhost,Pb,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up}} =
  838: 		recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity)))
  839:     end,
  840:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sa),
  841:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sb),
  842:     ok.
  843: 
  844: %% Test the API function connectx_init/4.
  845: api_connectx_init(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  846:     Localhost = {127,0,0,1},
  847: 
  848:     {ok,S} = gen_sctp:open(),
  849:     {ok,Pb} = inet:port(S),
  850:     try ?no_return(gen_sctp:connectx_init(S, Localhost, 12345, []))
  851:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  852:     end,
  853:     {error, einval} = gen_sctp:connectx_init(S, [Localhost], not_allowed_for_port, []),
  854:     %% try ?no_return(gen_sctp:connectx_init(S, [Localhost], not_allowed_for_port, []))
  855:     %% catch error:badarg -> ok
  856:     %% end,
  857:     try ?no_return(gen_sctp:connectx_init(S, [Localhost], 12345, not_allowed_for_opts))
  858:     catch error:badarg -> ok
  859:     end,
  860:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S),
  861:     {error,closed} = gen_sctp:connectx_init(S, [Localhost], 12345, []),
  862: 
  863:     {ok,Sb} = gen_sctp:open(Pb),
  864:     {ok,Sa} = gen_sctp:open(),
  865:     {ok, A1} = gen_sctp:connectx_init(Sa, [localhost], Pb, []),
  866:     true = (A1 =/= 0),
  867:     {Localhost,Pb,#sctp_assoc_change{state=cant_assoc, assoc_id = A1}} =
  868: 	recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity))),
  869:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sb, true),
  870:     {ok, A2} = gen_sctp:connectx_init(Sa, [localhost], Pb, []),
  871:     true = (A2 =/= 0),
  872:     {Localhost,Pb,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up, assoc_id = A2}} =
  873: 	recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity))),
  874:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sa),
  875:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sb),
  876:     ok.
  877: 
  878: recv_event({Addr, Port, [], #sctp_assoc_change{} = AssocChange}) ->
  879:     {Addr, Port, AssocChange};
  880: recv_event({Addr,Port,
  881: 	    [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id  = Assoc}],
  882: 	    #sctp_assoc_change{assoc_id = Assoc} = AssocChange}) ->
  883:     {Addr, Port, AssocChange};
  884: recv_event({Addr, Port, [], #sctp_paddr_change{} = PaddrChange}) ->
  885:     {Addr, Port, PaddrChange};
  886: recv_event({Addr, Port,
  887: 	    [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id  = Assoc}],
  888: 	    #sctp_paddr_change{assoc_id = Assoc} = PaddrChange}) ->
  889:     {Addr, Port, PaddrChange};
  890: recv_event({Addr, Port, [], #sctp_shutdown_event{} = ShutdownEvent}) ->
  891:     {Addr, Port, ShutdownEvent};
  892: recv_event({Addr, Port,
  893: 	    [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id    = Assoc}],
  894: 	    #sctp_shutdown_event{assoc_id = Assoc} = ShutdownEvent}) ->
  895:     {Addr, Port, ShutdownEvent}.
  896: 
  897: %% Test socket options.
  898: api_opts(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  899:     Sndbuf = 32768,
  900:     Recbuf = 65536,
  901:     {ok,S} = gen_sctp:open(0),
  902:     OSType = os:type(),
  903:     case {inet:setopts(S, [{linger,{true,2}}]),OSType} of
  904: 	{ok,_} ->
  905: 	    ok;
  906: 	{{error,einval},{unix,sunos}} ->
  907: 	    ok
  908:     end,
  909:     ok = inet:setopts(S, [{sndbuf,Sndbuf}]),
  910:     ok = inet:setopts(S, [{recbuf,Recbuf}]),
  911:     case inet:getopts(S, [sndbuf]) of
  912: 	{ok, [{sndbuf,SB}]} when SB >= Sndbuf -> ok
  913:     end,
  914:     case inet:getopts(S, [recbuf]) of
  915: 	{ok, [{recbuf, RB}]} when (RB >= Recbuf) -> ok
  916:     end.
  917: 
  918: %% What is this *actually* supposed to test?
  919: implicit_inet6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  920:     ?TC_TRY(implicit_inet6, fun() -> do_implicit_inet6(Config) end).
  921: 
  922: do_implicit_inet6(_Config) ->
  923:     ?P("begin"),
  924:     %% First
  925:     ?P("try create server socket (1)"),
  926:     case gen_sctp:open(0, [inet6]) of
  927: 	{ok, S1} ->
  928:             Loopback = {0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1},
  929:             ?P("*** ~s: ~p ***", ["Loopback", Loopback]),
  930:             implicit_inet6(S1, Loopback),
  931:             ok = gen_sctp:close(S1),
  932:             
  933:             %% Second
  934:             ?P("try create server socket (2)"),
  935:             Localhost =
  936:                 case inet:getaddr("localhost", inet6) of
  937:                     {ok, LH} ->
  938:                         LH;
  939:                     {error, nxdomain = Reason_getaddr} ->
  940:                         ?SKIPT(Reason_getaddr);
  941:                     {error, Reason_getaddr} ->
  942:                         ct:fail({unexpected, Reason_getaddr})
  943:                 end,
  944:             S2 = case gen_sctp:open(0, [{ip, Localhost}]) of
  945:                      {ok, S} ->
  946:                          S;
  947:                      {error, nxdomain = Reason_open} ->
  948:                          ?SKIPT(Reason_open);
  949:                      {error, Reason_open} ->
  950:                          ct:fail({unexpected, Reason_open})
  951:                  end,
  952: 
  953:             ?P("*** ~s: ~p ***", ["localhost", Localhost]),
  954:             implicit_inet6(S2, Localhost),
  955:             ok = gen_sctp:close(S2),
  956:             
  957:             %% Third
  958:             ?P("try create server socket (3)"),
  959:             Hostname = log_ok(inet:gethostname()),
  960:             Addr     = case inet:getaddr(Hostname, inet6) of
  961:                            {ok, A} ->
  962:                                A;
  963:                            {error, eafnosupport} ->
  964:                                ok = gen_sctp:close(S1),
  965:                                ?SKIPT("Can not look up IPv6 address")
  966:                        end,
  967:             S3 = log_ok(gen_sctp:open(0, [{ifaddr, Addr}])),
  968:             ?P("*** ~s: ~p ***", [Hostname, Addr]),
  969:             implicit_inet6(S3, Addr),
  970:             ok = gen_sctp:close(S1),
  971:             ?P("done"),
  972:             ok;
  973:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
  974:             ?SKIPT(open_failed_str(Reason));
  975:         _ ->
  976:             {skip, "IPv6 not supported"}
  977:     end.
  978: 
  979: 
  980: implicit_inet6(S1, Addr) ->
  981:     ?P("make (server) listen socket"),
  982:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(S1, true),
  983:     ServerPortNo = log_ok(inet:port(S1)),
  984:     ?P("try create (client) socket"),
  985:     S2 = case gen_sctp:open(0, [inet6, {ifaddr, Addr}]) of
  986:              {ok, Sock} ->
  987:                  ?P("client socket created: ~p", [Sock]),
  988:                  Sock;
  989:              {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
  990:                  ?P("could not create (client) socket with ifaddr: "
  991:                     "~n   ~p", [Addr]),
  992:                  ?SKIPT(open_failed_str(Reason))
  993:     end,
  994:     {ClientAddr, ClientPortNo} = log_ok(inet:sockname(S2)),
  995:     ?P("try connect"
  996:        "~n   from (connector): ~p, ~p (~p)"
  997:        "~n   to:               ~p, ~p",
  998:        [ClientAddr, ClientPortNo, S2, Addr, ServerPortNo]),
  999:     #sctp_assoc_change{state = comm_up} =
 1000: 	log_ok(gen_sctp:connect(S2, Addr, ServerPortNo, [])),
 1001:     ?P("connect success: await events"),
 1002:     implicit_inet6_await_ac_comm_up(S1, ClientAddr, ClientPortNo),
 1003:     ?P("verify server sockname"),
 1004:     case log_ok(inet:sockname(S1)) of
 1005: 	{Addr,              ServerPortNo} -> ok;
 1006: 	{{0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0}, ServerPortNo} -> ok
 1007:     end,
 1008:     ?P("verify client sockname"),
 1009:     case log_ok(inet:sockname(S2)) of
 1010: 	{Addr,              ClientPortNo} -> ok;
 1011: 	{{0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0}, ClientPortNo} -> ok
 1012:     end,
 1013:     ?P("client client socket"),
 1014:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S2),
 1015:     ?P("verification complete"),
 1016:     ok.
 1017: 
 1018: 
 1019: implicit_inet6_await_ac_comm_up(Sock, Addr, PortNo) ->
 1020:     {_OsFam, OsName} = os:type(),
 1021:     implicit_inet6_await_ac_comm_up(Sock, Addr, PortNo, OsName).
 1022: 
 1023: implicit_inet6_await_ac_comm_up(Sock, Addr, PortNo, OsName) ->
 1024:     case recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sock))) of
 1025: 	{Addr, PortNo, #sctp_assoc_change{state = comm_up}} ->
 1026:             ?P("received assoc-change:comm-up event => done"),
 1027: 	    ok;
 1028: 	{Addr, PortNo, #sctp_paddr_change{state = addr_confirmed,
 1029:                                           addr  = {Addr, PortNo},
 1030:                                           error = 0}} ->
 1031:             ?P("received paddr-change:addr-confirmed event - "
 1032:                "try recv assoc-change:comm-up"),
 1033:             implicit_inet6_await_ac_comm_up(Sock, Addr, PortNo, OsName);
 1034: 
 1035: 	{Addr2, PortNo2, #sctp_assoc_change{state = comm_up}}
 1036:           when (OsName =:= freebsd) ->
 1037:             ?P("Expected (assoc-change:comm-up) event from unexpected address: "
 1038:                "~n   Unexpected Address: ~p, ~p"
 1039:                "~n   Expected Address:   ~p, ~p"
 1040:                "~n   => RETRY"
 1041:                "~n", [Addr2, PortNo2, Addr, PortNo]),
 1042:             implicit_inet6_await_ac_comm_up(Sock, Addr, PortNo, OsName);
 1043: 	{Addr2, PortNo2, #sctp_paddr_change{state = addr_confirmed}}
 1044:           when (OsName =:= freebsd) ->
 1045:             ?P("Expected paddr-change:addr-confirmed event from "
 1046:                "UNEXPECTED ADDRESS: "
 1047:                "~n   UNEXPECTED Address: ~p, ~p"
 1048:                "~n   Expected Address:   ~p, ~p"
 1049:                "~n   => RETRY"
 1050:                "~n", [Addr2, PortNo2, Addr, PortNo]),
 1051:             implicit_inet6_await_ac_comm_up(Sock, Addr, PortNo, OsName);
 1052: 
 1053: 	{Addr2, PortNo2, #sctp_assoc_change{state = comm_up} = CX} = UNEX ->
 1054:             ?P("Expected (assoc-change:comm-up) event from UNEXPECTED ADDRESS: "
 1055:                "~n   UNEXPECTED Address: ~p, ~p"
 1056:                "~n   Expected Address:   ~p, ~p"
 1057:                "~n   Assoc Change:       ~p"
 1058:                "~n", [Addr2, PortNo2, Addr, PortNo, CX]),
 1059:             exit({unexpected_event, UNEX});
 1060: 
 1061: 	{AX, PX, #sctp_paddr_change{state = addr_confirmed} = CX} = UNEX ->
 1062:             ?P("Expected paddr-change:addr-confirmed event from "
 1063:                "UNEXPECTED ADDRESS: "
 1064:                "~n   UNEXPECTED Address: ~p, ~p"
 1065:                "~n   Expected Address:   ~p, ~p"
 1066:                "~n   PAddr Change:       ~p"
 1067:                "~n", [AX, PX, Addr, PortNo, CX]),
 1068:             exit({unexpected_event, UNEX});
 1069: 
 1070:         {AX, PX, CX} = UNEX ->
 1071:             ?P("UNEXPECTED EVENT: "
 1072:                "~n   ~p"
 1073:                "~n   UNEXPECTED ADDRESS: ~p, ~p"
 1074:                "~n   Expected Address:   ~p, ~p"
 1075:                "~n", [CX, AX, PX, Addr, PortNo]),
 1076:             exit({unexpected_event, UNEX})
 1077:     end.
 1078: 
 1079: 
 1080: %% Verify {active, N} socket management.
 1081: %% This is difficult to do since we do not just receive data messages.
 1082: %% Also, how do we know that sctp behaves the same way on all platforms?
 1083: active_n(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1084:     ?TC_TRY(active_n, fun() -> do_active_n(Config) end).
 1085: 
 1086: do_active_n(_Config) ->
 1087:     N = 3,
 1088:     S1 = ok(gen_sctp:open([{active,N}])),
 1089:     [{active,N}] = ok(inet:getopts(S1, [active])),
 1090:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,-N}]),
 1091:     receive
 1092:         {sctp_passive, S1} -> ok
 1093:     after
 1094:         5000 ->
 1095:             exit({error,sctp_passive_failure})
 1096:     end,
 1097:     [{active,false}] = ok(inet:getopts(S1, [active])),
 1098:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,0}]),
 1099:     receive
 1100:         {sctp_passive, S1} -> ok
 1101:     after
 1102:         5000 ->
 1103:             exit({error,sctp_passive_failure})
 1104:     end,
 1105:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,32767}]),
 1106:     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,1}]),
 1107:     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,-32769}]),
 1108:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,-32768}]),
 1109:     receive
 1110:         {sctp_passive, S1} -> ok
 1111:     after
 1112:         5000 ->
 1113:             exit({error,sctp_passive_failure})
 1114:     end,
 1115:     [{active,false}] = ok(inet:getopts(S1, [active])),
 1116:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,N}]),
 1117:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,true}]),
 1118:     [{active,true}] = ok(inet:getopts(S1, [active])),
 1119:     receive
 1120:         _ -> exit({error,active_n})
 1121:     after
 1122:         0 ->
 1123:             ok
 1124:     end,
 1125:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,N}]),
 1126:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,once}]),
 1127:     [{active,once}] = ok(inet:getopts(S1, [active])),
 1128:     receive
 1129:         _ -> exit({error,active_n})
 1130:     after
 1131:         0 ->
 1132:             ok
 1133:     end,
 1134:     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,32768}]),
 1135:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,false}]),
 1136:     [{active,false}] = ok(inet:getopts(S1, [active])),
 1137:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(S1, true),
 1138:     S1Port = ok(inet:port(S1)),
 1139:     S2 = ok(gen_sctp:open(0, [{active,false}])),
 1140:     Assoc = ok(gen_sctp:connect(S2, "localhost", S1Port, [])),
 1141:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{active,N}]),
 1142:     active_n_flush_connect_msgs(S1),
 1143:     active_n_send_loop(N, S2, Assoc, S1),
 1144:     S3 = ok(gen_sctp:open([{active,0}])),
 1145:     receive
 1146:         {sctp_passive,S3} ->
 1147:             [{active,false}] = ok(inet:getopts(S3, [active]))
 1148:     after
 1149:         5000 ->
 1150:             exit({error,udp_passive})
 1151:     end,
 1152:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S3),
 1153:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S2),
 1154:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S1),
 1155:     ok.
 1156: 
 1157: 
 1158: %% There is no way to know how many addresses this host has,
 1159: %% and if there is "too many" (more then N = 3), then the
 1160: %% socket may already be passive. In this case the send-
 1161: %% loop will fail.
 1162: %% So, if we get a passive-message here, we just give up (=skip).
 1163: active_n_flush_connect_msgs(Sock) ->
 1164:     %% This seems only to be needed on certain platforms
 1165:     active_n_flush_connect_msgs(os:type(), Sock).
 1166: 
 1167: active_n_flush_connect_msgs(_, Sock) ->
 1168:     do_active_n_flush_connect_msgs(Sock).
 1169: %% active_n_flush_connect_msgs({unix, freebsd}, Sock) ->
 1170: %%     do_active_n_flush_connect_msgs(Sock);
 1171: %% active_n_flush_connect_msgs(_, _) ->
 1172: %%     ok.
 1173: 
 1174: do_active_n_flush_connect_msgs(Sock) ->
 1175:     receive
 1176:         {sctp_passive, Sock} ->
 1177:             ?P("connect-flush-loop -> premature passive"),
 1178:             ?SKIPT("Too many addresses (premature passive)");
 1179: 
 1180:         {sctp, Sock,
 1181:          _FromIP, _FromPort,
 1182:          {[], #sctp_assoc_change{state = comm_up}}} ->
 1183:             ?P("connect-flush-loop -> "
 1184:                "connect message discard - assoc change : comm-up"),
 1185:             ok = inet:setopts(Sock, [{active, 1}]),
 1186:             do_active_n_flush_connect_msgs(Sock);
 1187: 
 1188:         {sctp, Sock,
 1189:          _FromIP, _FromPort,
 1190:          {[], #sctp_paddr_change{state    = addr_confirmed,
 1191:                                  addr     = Addr,
 1192:                                  error    = Error,
 1193:                                  assoc_id = AID}}} ->
 1194:             ?P("connect-flush-loop -> "
 1195:                "connect message discard - paddr change : addr-confirmed:"
 1196:                "~n   Addr:    ~p"
 1197:                "~n   Error:   ~p"
 1198:                "~n   AssocID: ~p", [Addr, Error, AID]),
 1199:             ok = inet:setopts(Sock, [{active, 1}]),
 1200:             do_active_n_flush_connect_msgs(Sock)
 1201: 
 1202:     after 5000 ->
 1203:             ok
 1204:     end.
 1205:             
 1206: active_n_send_loop(Count, SrcSock, SndAssoc, DstSock) ->
 1207:     active_n_send_loop(0, Count, SrcSock, SndAssoc, DstSock).
 1208: 
 1209: active_n_send_loop(Count, Count, _SndSock, _SndAssoc, RcvSock) ->
 1210:     ?P("send-loop -> we are done - wait for passive"),
 1211:     receive
 1212:         {sctp_passive, RcvSock} ->
 1213:             ?P("received passive"),
 1214:             ok
 1215:     after
 1216:         5000 ->
 1217:             ?P("UNEXPECTED TIMEOUT: "
 1218:                "~n   Message Queue:    ~p"
 1219:                "~n   Active:           ~p",
 1220:                [process_info(self(), messages),
 1221:                 inet:getopts(RcvSock, [active])]),
 1222:             exit({error, timeout})
 1223:     end;
 1224: 
 1225: active_n_send_loop(Sent, Count, SndSock, SndAssoc, RcvSock) ->
 1226:     Msg = list_to_binary("message " ++ integer_to_list(Sent+1)),
 1227:     ?P("send-loop(~w,~w) -> send message (on ~p)", [Sent, Count, SndSock]),
 1228:     ok = gen_sctp:send(SndSock, SndAssoc, 0, Msg),
 1229:     receive
 1230:         {sctp, RcvSock, FromIP, FromPort, {[SR], Msg}}
 1231:         when is_record(SR, sctp_sndrcvinfo) ->
 1232:             ?P("send-loop(~w,~w) -> "
 1233:                "recv (expected) data message (on ~p):"
 1234:                "~n   Msg:  ~p"
 1235:                "~n   From: ~p, ~p",
 1236:                [Sent, Count,
 1237:                 RcvSock, Msg, FromIP, FromPort]),
 1238:             active_n_send_loop(Sent+1, Count, SndSock, SndAssoc, RcvSock);
 1239:         
 1240:         {sctp, RcvSock, _FromIP, _FromPort, {_AncData, _Data}} ->
 1241:             %% ignore non-data messages
 1242:             %% we should not get any here because of the flush loop,
 1243:             %% but just in case...
 1244:             ?P("send-loop(~w,~w) -> "
 1245:                "ignore non-data messages (on ~p):"
 1246:                "~n   From:    ~p:~p"
 1247:                "~n   AncData: ~p"
 1248:                "~n   Data:    ~p",
 1249:                [Sent, Count,
 1250:                 RcvSock, _FromIP, _FromPort, _AncData, _Data]),
 1251:             
 1252:             %% It may be too late to update here,
 1253:             %% the socket may already have gone passive 
 1254:             %% and generated a passive message!
 1255:             
 1256:             ok = inet:setopts(RcvSock, [{active, 1}]),
 1257: 
 1258:             active_n_send_loop(Sent, Count, SndSock, SndAssoc, RcvSock);
 1259:         
 1260:         Other ->
 1261:             ?P("send-loop(~w,~w) -> "
 1262:                "UNEXPECTED: "
 1263:                "~n   Other:     ~p"
 1264:                "~n   Send Sock: ~p"
 1265:                "~n   Recv Sock: ~p", [Sent, Count,
 1266:                                       Other, SndSock, RcvSock]),
 1267:             exit({unexpected, Other})
 1268:     after
 1269:         5000 ->
 1270:             exit({error,timeout})
 1271:     end.
 1272:     
 1273: %% Hello world stream socket.
 1274: basic_stream(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1275:     {ok,S} = gen_sctp:open([{type,stream}]),
 1276:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(S, true),
 1277:     ok =
 1278: 	do_from_other_process(
 1279: 	  fun () -> gen_sctp:listen(S, 10) end),
 1280:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S),
 1281:     ok.
 1282: 
 1283: %% Minimal data transfer.
 1284: xfer_stream_min(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1285:     {_, OSName} = os:type(),
 1286:     Stream = 0,
 1287:     Data = <<"The quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog 0123456789">>,
 1288:     Loopback = {127,0,0,1},
 1289:     {ok,Sb} = gen_sctp:open([{type,seqpacket}]),
 1290:     ?LOGVAR(Sb),
 1291:     {ok,Pb} = inet:port(Sb),
 1292:     ?LOGVAR(Pb),
 1293:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sb, true),
 1294: 
 1295:     {ok,Sa} = gen_sctp:open([{type,stream}]),
 1296:     ?LOGVAR(Sa),
 1297:     {ok,Pa} = inet:port(Sa),
 1298:     ?LOGVAR(Pa),
 1299:     #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
 1300: 		       error=0,
 1301: 		       outbound_streams=SaOutboundStreams,
 1302: 		       inbound_streams=SaInboundStreams,
 1303: 		       assoc_id=SaAssocId_X} =
 1304: 	log_ok(gen_sctp:connect(Sa, Loopback, Pb, [])),
 1305:     ?LOGVAR(SaAssocId_X),
 1306:     [{_,#sctp_paddrinfo{assoc_id=SaAssocId,state=active}}] =
 1307: 	log_ok(inet:getopts(Sa, [{sctp_get_peer_addr_info,
 1308: 				  #sctp_paddrinfo{address={Loopback,Pb}}}])),
 1309:     ?LOGVAR(SaAssocId),
 1310:     match_unless_solaris(SaAssocId_X, SaAssocId),
 1311: 
 1312:     {SbOutboundStreams,SbInboundStreams,SbAssocId} =
 1313: 	case recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))) of
 1314: 	    {Loopback,Pa,
 1315: 	     #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
 1316: 				error=0,
 1317: 				outbound_streams=OS,
 1318: 				inbound_streams=IS,
 1319: 				assoc_id=AI}} ->
 1320: 		{OS,IS,AI};
 1321: 	    {Loopback,Pa,
 1322: 	     #sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_confirmed,
 1323: 				addr={Loopback,Pa},
 1324: 				error=0,
 1325: 				assoc_id=AI}} ->
 1326: 		{Loopback,Pa,
 1327: 		 #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up,
 1328: 				    error=0,
 1329: 				    outbound_streams=OS,
 1330: 				    inbound_streams=IS,
 1331: 				    assoc_id=AI}} =
 1332: 		    recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))),
 1333: 		{OS,IS,AI}
 1334: 	end,
 1335:     ?LOGVAR(SbAssocId),
 1336:     SaOutboundStreams = SbInboundStreams,
 1337:     ?LOGVAR(SaOutboundStreams),
 1338:     SbOutboundStreams = SaInboundStreams,
 1339:     ?LOGVAR(SbOutboundStreams),
 1340:     ok = gen_sctp:send(Sa, SaAssocId, 0, Data),
 1341:     case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity)) of
 1342: 	{Loopback,
 1343: 	 Pa,
 1344: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream   = Stream,
 1345: 			   assoc_id = SbAssocId}],
 1346: 	 Data} ->
 1347:             ?P("[1] received expected data with ancillary data => done"),
 1348:             ok;
 1349: 
 1350: 	{Loopback,
 1351: 	 Pa,
 1352:          [],
 1353: 	 #sctp_paddr_change{addr     = {Loopback,_},
 1354: 			    state    = addr_available,
 1355: 			    error    = 0,
 1356: 			    assoc_id = SbAssocId}} ->
 1357:             ?P("[2] received paddr change => recv again"),
 1358:             Res2 = log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity)),
 1359:             ?P("[2] recv ok => "
 1360:                "~n   ~p", [Res2]),
 1361: 	    {Loopback,
 1362: 	     Pa,
 1363: 	     [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream   = Stream,
 1364: 			       assoc_id = SbAssocId}],
 1365: 	     Data} = Res2,
 1366:             ?P("[2] received expected data with ancillary data => done"),
 1367:             Res2;
 1368: 
 1369: 	{Loopback,
 1370: 	 Pa,
 1371: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream    = Stream,
 1372: 			   assoc_id  = SbAssocId}],
 1373: 	 #sctp_paddr_change{addr     = {Loopback,_},
 1374: 			    state    = addr_confirmed,
 1375: 			    error    = 0,
 1376: 			    assoc_id = SbAssocId}} ->
 1377:             ?P("[3] received paddr change with ancillary data => recv again"),
 1378:             Res3 = log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity)),
 1379:             ?P("[3] recv ok => "
 1380:                "~n   ~p", [Res3]),
 1381: 	    {Loopback,
 1382: 	     Pa,
 1383: 	     [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream   = Stream,
 1384: 			       assoc_id = SbAssocId}],
 1385: 	     Data} = Res3,
 1386:             ?P("[3] received expected data with ancillary data => done"),
 1387:             Res3;
 1388: 
 1389:         %% It seems that on FreeBSD (for instance) we don't get any
 1390:         %% AncData with this.
 1391: 	{Loopback,
 1392: 	 Pa,
 1393: 	 [],
 1394: 	 #sctp_paddr_change{addr     = {Loopback,_},
 1395: 			    state    = addr_confirmed,
 1396: 			    error    = 0,
 1397: 			    assoc_id = SbAssocId}} when (OSName =:= freebsd) ->
 1398:             ?P("[4] received paddr change without ancillary data => "
 1399:                "recv again"),
 1400:             Res4 = log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity)),
 1401:             ?P("[4] recv ok => "
 1402:                "~n   ~p", [Res4]),
 1403: 	    {Loopback,
 1404: 	     Pa,
 1405: 	     [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream   = Stream,
 1406:                                assoc_id = SbAssocId}],
 1407: 	     Data} = Res4,
 1408:             ?P("[4] received expected data with ancillary data => done"),
 1409:             Res4;
 1410: 
 1411:         {FromIPX, FromPortX, AncDataX, DataX} = Other1 ->
 1412:             ?P("UNEXPECTED: "
 1413:                "~n   FromIP:   ~p"
 1414:                "~n   FromPort: ~p"
 1415:                "~n   AncData:  ~p"
 1416:                "~n   Data:     ~p"
 1417:                "~nwhen"
 1418:                "~n   Loopback: ~p"
 1419:                "~n   Pa:       ~p",
 1420:                [FromIPX, FromPortX, AncDataX, DataX, Loopback, Pa]),
 1421:             exit({unexpected, Other1});
 1422:         Other2 ->
 1423:             ?P("UNEXPECTED: "
 1424:                "~n   Other:    ~p"
 1425:                "~nwhen"
 1426:                "~n   Loopback: ~p"
 1427:                "~n   Pa:       ~p",
 1428:                [Other2, Loopback, Pa]),
 1429:             exit({unexpected, Other2})
 1430:     end,
 1431:     ok =
 1432: 	do_from_other_process(
 1433: 	  fun () -> gen_sctp:send(Sb, SbAssocId, 0, Data) end),
 1434:     case log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity)) of
 1435: 	{Loopback,Pb,
 1436: 	 [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,
 1437: 			   assoc_id=SaAssocId}],
 1438: 	 Data} -> ok;
 1439: 	Event1 ->
 1440: 	    {Loopback,Pb,
 1441: 	     #sctp_paddr_change{state=addr_confirmed,
 1442: 				addr={_,Pb},
 1443: 				error=0,
 1444: 				assoc_id=SaAssocId}} =
 1445: 		recv_event(Event1),
 1446: 	    {Loopback,Pb,
 1447: 	     [#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,
 1448: 			       assoc_id=SaAssocId}],
 1449: 	     Data} =
 1450: 		log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity))
 1451:     end,
 1452:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sa),
 1453:     {Loopback,Pa,
 1454:      #sctp_shutdown_event{assoc_id=SbAssocId}} =
 1455: 	recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))),
 1456:     {Loopback,Pa,
 1457:      #sctp_assoc_change{state=shutdown_comp,
 1458: 			error=0,
 1459: 			assoc_id=SbAssocId}} =
 1460: 	recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sb, infinity))),
 1461:     ok = gen_sctp:close(Sb),
 1462: 
 1463:     receive
 1464: 	Msg -> ct:fail({received,Msg})
 1465:     after 17 -> ok
 1466:     end,
 1467:     ok.
 1468: 
 1469: 
 1470: 
 1471: do_from_other_process(Fun) ->
 1472:     Parent = self(),
 1473:     Ref = make_ref(),
 1474:     Child =
 1475: 	spawn(fun () ->
 1476: 		      try Fun() of
 1477: 			  Result ->
 1478: 			      Parent ! {Ref,Result}
 1479: 		      catch
 1480: 			  Class:Reason:Stacktrace ->
 1481: 			      Parent ! {Ref,Class,Reason,Stacktrace}
 1482: 		      end
 1483: 	      end),
 1484:     Mref = erlang:monitor(process, Child),
 1485:     receive
 1486: 	{Ref,Result} ->
 1487: 	    receive {'DOWN',Mref,_,_,_} -> Result end;
 1488: 	{Ref,Class,Reason,Stacktrace} ->
 1489: 	    receive {'DOWN',Mref,_,_,_} ->
 1490: 		    erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 1491: 	    end;
 1492: 	{'DOWN',Mref,_,_,Reason} ->
 1493: 	    erlang:exit(Reason)
 1494:     end.
 1495: 
 1496: 
 1497: %% Peel off an SCTP stream socket ({active,once}).
 1498: 
 1499: peeloff_active_once(Config) ->
 1500:     peeloff(Config, [{active,once}]).
 1501: 
 1502: %% Peel off an SCTP stream socket ({active,true}).
 1503: 
 1504: peeloff_active_true(Config) ->
 1505:     peeloff(Config, [{active,true}]).
 1506: 
 1507: %% Peel off an SCTP stream socket ({active,N}).
 1508: 
 1509: peeloff_active_n(Config) ->
 1510:     peeloff(Config, [{active,1}]).
 1511: 
 1512: peeloff(Config, SockOpts) when is_list(Config) ->
 1513:     Addr = {127,0,0,1},
 1514:     Stream = 0,
 1515:     Timeout = 333,
 1516:     StartTime = timestamp(),
 1517:     {{S1,P1,S1Ai}, {S2,P2,S2Ai}} =
 1518:         socket_pair_open(Addr, StartTime, Timeout),
 1519:     Socket1 = socket_call(S1, get_socket),
 1520:     ?LOGVAR(Socket1),
 1521:     Socket2 = socket_call(S2, get_socket),
 1522:     ?LOGVAR(Socket2),
 1523:     %%
 1524:     socket_call(S2, {send,S2Ai,Stream,<<"Number one">>}),
 1525:     receive
 1526: 	{S1,{Addr,P2,S1Ai,Stream,<<"Number one">>}} -> ok
 1527:     after Timeout ->
 1528: 	    socket_bailout([S1,S2], StartTime)
 1529:     end,
 1530:     socket_call(S2, {send,Socket1,S1Ai,Stream,<<"Number two">>}),
 1531:     receive
 1532: 	{S2,{Addr,P1,S2Ai,Stream,<<"Number two">>}} -> ok
 1533:     after Timeout ->
 1534: 	    socket_bailout([S1,S2], StartTime)
 1535:     end,
 1536:     %%
 1537:     S3 = socket_peeloff(Socket1, S1Ai, SockOpts, Timeout),
 1538:     ?LOGVAR(S3),
 1539:     P3_X = socket_call(S3, get_port),
 1540:     ?LOGVAR(P3_X),
 1541:     P3 = case P3_X of 0 -> P1; _ -> P3_X end,
 1542:     [{_,#sctp_paddrinfo{assoc_id=S3Ai,state=active}}] =
 1543: 	socket_call(S3,
 1544: 		    {getopts,[{sctp_get_peer_addr_info,
 1545: 			       #sctp_paddrinfo{address={Addr,P2}}}]}),
 1546:     %%S3Ai = S1Ai,
 1547:     ?LOGVAR(S3Ai),
 1548:     %%
 1549:     socket_call(S3, {send,S3Ai,Stream,<<"Number three">>}),
 1550:     receive
 1551: 	{S2,{Addr,P3,S2Ai,Stream,<<"Number three">>}} -> ok
 1552:     after Timeout ->
 1553: 	    socket_bailout([S1,S2,S3], StartTime)
 1554:     end,
 1555:     socket_call(S3, {send,Socket2,S2Ai,Stream,<<"Number four">>}),
 1556:     receive
 1557: 	{S3,{Addr,P2,S3Ai,Stream,<<"Number four">>}} -> ok
 1558:     after Timeout ->
 1559: 	    socket_bailout([S1,S2,S3], StartTime)
 1560:     end,
 1561:     %%
 1562:     inet:i(sctp),
 1563:     socket_close_verbose(S1, StartTime),
 1564:     socket_close_verbose(S2, StartTime),
 1565:     receive
 1566: 	{S3,{Addr,P2,#sctp_shutdown_event{assoc_id=S3Ai_X}}} ->
 1567: 	    match_unless_solaris(S3Ai, S3Ai_X)
 1568:     after Timeout ->
 1569: 	    socket_bailout([S3], StartTime)
 1570:     end,
 1571:     receive
 1572: 	{S3,{Addr,P2,#sctp_assoc_change{state=shutdown_comp,
 1573: 					assoc_id=S3Ai}}} -> ok
 1574:     after Timeout ->
 1575: 	    socket_bailout([S3], StartTime)
 1576:     end,
 1577:     socket_close_verbose(S3, StartTime),
 1578:     [] = flush(),
 1579:     ok.
 1580: 
 1581: %% Check sndbuf and recbuf behaviour.
 1582: buffers(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1583:     Limit = 4096,
 1584:     Addr = {127,0,0,1},
 1585:     Stream = 1,
 1586:     Timeout = 3333,
 1587:     StartTime = timestamp(),
 1588:     {{S1,_P1,S1Ai}, {S2,P2,S2Ai}} = SocketPair =
 1589:         socket_pair_open(Addr, StartTime, Timeout),
 1590:     %%
 1591:     socket_call(S1, {setopts,[{recbuf,Limit}]}),
 1592:     Recbuf =
 1593: 	case socket_call(S1, {getopts,[recbuf]}) of
 1594: 	    [{recbuf,RB1}] when RB1 >= Limit -> RB1
 1595: 	end,
 1596:     Data = mk_data(Recbuf+Limit),
 1597:     socket_call(S2, {setopts,[{sndbuf,Recbuf+Limit}]}),
 1598:     socket_call(S2, {send,S2Ai,Stream,Data}),
 1599:     receive
 1600: 	{S1,{Addr,P2,S1Ai,Stream,Data}} -> ok
 1601:     after Timeout ->
 1602: 	    socket_bailout([S1,S2], StartTime)
 1603:     end,
 1604:     %%
 1605:     socket_pair_close(Addr, StartTime, Timeout, SocketPair).
 1606: 
 1607: mk_data(Bytes) ->
 1608:     mk_data(0, Bytes, <<>>).
 1609: %%
 1610: mk_data(N, Bytes, Bin) when N < Bytes ->
 1611:     mk_data(N+4, Bytes, <<Bin/binary,N:32>>);
 1612: mk_data(_, _, Bin) ->
 1613:     Bin.
 1614: 
 1615: 
 1616: send_block(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1617:     Limit          = 4096,
 1618:     Addr           = {127,0,0,1},
 1619:     Stream         = 1,
 1620:     Timeout        = 1111,
 1621:     ReceiveTimeout = 3333,
 1622:     StartTime      = timestamp(),
 1623:     N              = 8,
 1624:     %%
 1625:     {{S1,P1,S1Ai}, {S2,_P2,S2Ai}} = SocketPair =
 1626:         socket_pair_open(Addr, StartTime, Timeout),
 1627:     %%
 1628:     socket_call(S1, {setopts,[{sndbuf,Limit}]}),
 1629:     Sndbuf =
 1630: 	case socket_call(S1, {getopts,[sndbuf]}) of
 1631: 	    [{sndbuf,SB1}] when SB1 >= Limit -> SB1
 1632: 	end,
 1633:     ?LOGVAR(Sndbuf),
 1634:     Data = mk_data(Sndbuf div 2),
 1635:     Seq = lists:seq(1, N),
 1636:     ok = socket_call(S2, {setopts,[{recbuf,Sndbuf*2},{active,false}]}),
 1637:     Sender = self(),
 1638:     ReceiveFun =
 1639:         fun RF(J) when 0 < J ->
 1640:                 receive
 1641:                     {Sender, send, J} ->
 1642:                         ct:log("send signalled {~w}: ~w~n", [self(), J]),
 1643:                         RF(J + 1)
 1644:                 after Timeout ->
 1645:                         ct:log("send timed out {~w}: ~w~n", [self(), J]),
 1646:                         ok = socket_call(S2, {setopts, [{active, true}]}),
 1647:                         ct:log("set active true {~w}: ~w~n", [self(), J]),
 1648:                         RF(-1)
 1649:                 end;
 1650:             RF(J) when -N =< J, J < 0 ->
 1651:                 receive
 1652:                     {S2,{Addr,P1,S2Ai,Stream,<<I:32,Data/binary>>}} ->
 1653:                         ct:log("recv {~w}: ~w~n", [self(), I]),
 1654:                         I = -J,
 1655:                         RF(J - 1)
 1656:                 after ReceiveTimeout ->
 1657:                         %% For some reason, hopefully not our fault,
 1658:                         %% we'll say OS reason for now, there is a 1..2 s
 1659:                         %% delay between the first and the second message
 1660:                         %% received after setting active=true,
 1661:                         %% even though there are 2 (at least) messages
 1662:                         %% buffered by the sending side.
 1663:                         %%
 1664:                         %% Therefore ReceiveTimeout is above 3 s
 1665:                         %% while Timeout can be shorter...
 1666:                         socket_bailout([S1,S2], StartTime)
 1667:                 end;
 1668:             RF(J) when J < -N ->
 1669:                 ok = socket_controlling_process(S2, Sender),
 1670:                 Sender ! {self(), ok}
 1671:         end,
 1672:     Receiver = spawn_link(fun () -> ReceiveFun(1) end),
 1673:     ok = socket_controlling_process(S2, Receiver),
 1674:     [begin
 1675:          ok = socket_call(S1, {send,S1Ai,Stream,<<J:32,Data/binary>>}),
 1676:          ct:log("send {~w}: ~w~n", [self(), J]),
 1677:          Receiver ! {Sender, send, J}
 1678:      end || J <- Seq],
 1679:     receive {Receiver, ok} -> ok end,
 1680:     %%
 1681:     socket_pair_close(Addr, StartTime, Timeout, SocketPair).
 1682: 
 1683: %% Test opening a multihoming ipv4 socket.
 1684: open_multihoming_ipv4_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1685:     ?P("get addrs by family (inet)"),
 1686:     case get_addrs_by_family(inet, 2) of
 1687: 	{ok, [Addr1, Addr2]} ->
 1688:             ?P("got addrs: "
 1689:                "~n      Addr1: ~p"
 1690:                "~n      Addr2: ~p", [Addr1, Addr2]),
 1691: 	    do_open_and_connect([Addr1, Addr2], Addr1);
 1692: 	{error, Reason} ->
 1693:             ?P("failed get addrs: "
 1694:                "~n      ~p", [Reason]),
 1695: 	    {skip, Reason}
 1696:     end.
 1697: 
 1698: %% This test is mostly aimed to indicate whether host has a
 1699: %% non-working ipv6 setup.  Test opening a unihoming (non-multihoming)
 1700: %% ipv6 socket.
 1701: open_unihoming_ipv6_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1702:     case get_addrs_by_family(inet6, 1) of
 1703: 	{ok, [Addr]} ->
 1704: 	    do_open_and_connect([Addr], Addr);
 1705: 	{error, Reason} ->
 1706: 	    {skip, Reason}
 1707:     end.
 1708: 
 1709: 
 1710: %% Test opening a multihoming ipv6 socket.
 1711: open_multihoming_ipv6_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1712:     case get_addrs_by_family(inet6, 2) of
 1713: 	{ok, [Addr1, Addr2]} ->
 1714: 	    do_open_and_connect([Addr1, Addr2], Addr1);
 1715: 	{error, Reason} ->
 1716: 	    {skip, Reason}
 1717:     end.
 1718: 
 1719: %% Test opening a multihoming ipv6 socket with ipv4 and ipv6 addresses.
 1720: open_multihoming_ipv4_and_ipv6_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1721:     case get_addrs_by_family(inet_and_inet6, 2) of
 1722: 	{ok, [[InetAddr1, InetAddr2], [Inet6Addr1, Inet6Addr2]]} ->
 1723: 	    %% Connect to the first address to test bind
 1724: 	    do_open_and_connect([InetAddr1, Inet6Addr1, InetAddr2],
 1725: 				InetAddr1),
 1726: 	    do_open_and_connect([Inet6Addr1, InetAddr1],
 1727: 				Inet6Addr1),
 1728: 
 1729: 	    %% Connect an address, not the first,
 1730: 	    %% to test sctp_bindx
 1731: 	    do_open_and_connect([Inet6Addr1, Inet6Addr2, InetAddr1],
 1732: 				Inet6Addr2),
 1733: 	    do_open_and_connect([Inet6Addr1, Inet6Addr2, InetAddr1],
 1734: 				InetAddr1);
 1735: 	{error, Reason} ->
 1736: 	    {skip, Reason}
 1737:     end.
 1738: 
 1739: %% Test inet:socknames/peernames on unihoming IPv4 sockets.
 1740: names_unihoming_ipv4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1741:     do_names(Config, inet, 1).
 1742: 
 1743: %% Test inet:socknames/peernames on unihoming IPv6 sockets.
 1744: names_unihoming_ipv6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1745:     do_names(Config, inet6, 1).
 1746: 
 1747: %% Test inet:socknames/peernames on multihoming IPv4 sockets.
 1748: names_multihoming_ipv4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1749:     do_names(Config, inet, 2).
 1750: 
 1751: %% Test inet:socknames/peernames on multihoming IPv6 sockets.
 1752: names_multihoming_ipv6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1753:     do_names(Config, inet6, 2).
 1754: 
 1755: 
 1756: 
 1757: do_names(_, FamilySpec, AddressCount) ->
 1758:     Fun =
 1759: 	fun (ServerSocket, _, ServerAssoc, ClientSocket, _, ClientAssoc) ->
 1760: 		ServerSocknamesNoassoc =
 1761: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:socknames(ServerSocket))),
 1762: 		?LOGVAR(ServerSocknamesNoassoc),
 1763: 		ServerSocknames =
 1764: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:socknames(ServerSocket, ServerAssoc))),
 1765: 		?LOGVAR(ServerSocknames),
 1766: 		[_|_] =
 1767: 		    ordsets:intersection
 1768: 		      (ServerSocknamesNoassoc, ServerSocknames),
 1769: 		ClientSocknamesNoassoc =
 1770: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:socknames(ClientSocket))),
 1771: 		?LOGVAR(ClientSocknamesNoassoc),
 1772: 		ClientSocknames =
 1773: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:socknames(ClientSocket, ClientAssoc))),
 1774: 		?LOGVAR(ClientSocknames),
 1775: 		[_|_] =
 1776: 		    ordsets:intersection
 1777: 		      (ClientSocknamesNoassoc, ClientSocknames),
 1778: 		err([einval,enotconn], inet:peernames(ServerSocket)),
 1779: 		ServerPeernames =
 1780: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:peernames(ServerSocket, ServerAssoc))),
 1781: 		?LOGVAR(ServerPeernames),
 1782: 		err([einval,enotconn], inet:peernames(ClientSocket)),
 1783: 		ClientPeernames =
 1784: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:peernames(ClientSocket, ClientAssoc))),
 1785: 		?LOGVAR(ClientPeernames),
 1786: 		ServerSocknames = ClientPeernames,
 1787: 		ClientSocknames = ServerPeernames,
 1788: 		{ok,Socket} =
 1789: 		    gen_sctp:peeloff(ServerSocket, ServerAssoc),
 1790: 		SocknamesNoassoc =
 1791: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:socknames(Socket))),
 1792: 		?LOGVAR(SocknamesNoassoc),
 1793: 		Socknames =
 1794: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:socknames(Socket, ServerAssoc))),
 1795: 		?LOGVAR(Socknames),
 1796: 		true =
 1797: 		    ordsets:is_subset(SocknamesNoassoc, Socknames),
 1798: 		Peernames =
 1799: 		    lists:sort(ok(inet:peernames(Socket, ServerAssoc))),
 1800: 		?LOGVAR(Peernames),
 1801: 		ok = gen_sctp:close(Socket),
 1802: 		Socknames = ClientPeernames,
 1803: 		ClientSocknames = Peernames,
 1804: 		ok
 1805: 	end,
 1806:     case get_addrs_by_family(FamilySpec, AddressCount) of
 1807: 	{ok, Addresses} when length(Addresses) =:= AddressCount ->
 1808: 	    do_open_and_connect(Addresses, hd(Addresses), Fun);
 1809: 	{error, Reason} ->
 1810: 	    {skip, Reason}
 1811:     end.
 1812: 
 1813: 
 1814: 
 1815: get_addrs_by_family(Family, NumAddrs) ->
 1816:     case os:type() of
 1817: 	{unix,linux} ->
 1818: 	    get_addrs_by_family_aux(Family, NumAddrs);
 1819: 	{unix,freebsd} ->
 1820: 	    get_addrs_by_family_aux(Family, NumAddrs);
 1821: 	{unix,sunos} ->
 1822: 	    case get_addrs_by_family_aux(Family, NumAddrs) of
 1823: 		{ok, [InetAddrs, Inet6Addrs]} when Family =:= inet_and_inet6 ->
 1824: 		    %% Man page for sctp_bindx on Solaris says: "If sock is an
 1825: 		    %% Internet Protocol Version 6 (IPv6) socket, addrs should
 1826: 		    %% be an array of sockaddr_in6 structures containing IPv6
 1827: 		    %% or IPv4-mapped IPv6 addresses."
 1828: 		    {ok, [ipv4_map_addrs(InetAddrs), Inet6Addrs]};
 1829: 		{ok, Addrs} ->
 1830: 		    {ok, Addrs};
 1831: 		{error, Reason} ->
 1832: 		    {error, Reason}
 1833: 	    end;
 1834: 	Os ->
 1835: 	    Reason = if Family =:= inet_and_inet6 ->
 1836: 			     ?F("Mixing ipv4 and ipv6 addresses for "
 1837: 			       " multihoming has not been verified on ~p",
 1838:                                 [Os]);
 1839: 			true ->
 1840: 			     ?F("Multihoming for ~p has not been verified "
 1841:                                 "on ~p", [Family, Os])
 1842: 		     end,
 1843: 	    {error, Reason}
 1844:     end.
 1845: 
 1846: get_addrs_by_family_aux(Family, NumAddrs) when Family =:= inet;
 1847: 					       Family =:= inet6 ->
 1848:     case inet:getaddr(localhost, Family) of
 1849: 	{error, eafnosupport = Reason} ->
 1850:             ?P("failed get (~w) addrs for localhost: ~p", [Family, Reason]),
 1851: 	    {error, ?F("No support for ~p (~p)", [Family, Reason])};
 1852:         {error, nxdomain = Reason} ->
 1853:             ?P("failed get (~w) addrs for localhost: ~p", [Family, Reason]),
 1854: 	    {error, ?F("No support for ~p (~p)", [Family, Reason])};
 1855: 	{ok, _} ->
 1856:             ?P("got addr for localhost (ignored)"),
 1857: 	    IfAddrs = ok(inet:getifaddrs()),
 1858:             ?P("IfAddrs: ~p", [IfAddrs]),
 1859: 	    case filter_addrs_by_family(IfAddrs, Family) of
 1860: 		Addrs when length(Addrs) >= NumAddrs ->
 1861: 		    {ok, lists:sublist(Addrs, NumAddrs)};
 1862: 		[] ->
 1863: 		    {error, ?F("Need ~p ~p address(es) found none~n",
 1864:                                [NumAddrs, Family])};
 1865: 		Addrs ->
 1866: 		    {error,
 1867: 		     ?F("Need ~p ~p address(es) found only ~p: ~p~n",
 1868:                         [NumAddrs, Family, length(Addrs), Addrs])}
 1869: 	    end
 1870:     end;
 1871: get_addrs_by_family_aux(inet_and_inet6, NumAddrs) ->
 1872:     try {ok, [case get_addrs_by_family_aux(Family, NumAddrs) of
 1873:                   {ok, Addrs}     -> Addrs;
 1874:                   {error, Reason} -> throw({error, Reason})
 1875:               end || Family <- [inet, inet6]]}
 1876:     catch
 1877:         throw:{error, _} = ERROR ->
 1878:             ERROR
 1879:     end.
 1880: 
 1881: filter_addrs_by_family(IfAddrs, Family) ->
 1882:     lists:flatten([[Addr || {addr, Addr} <- Info,
 1883: 			    is_good_addr(Addr, Family)]
 1884: 		   || {_IfName, Info} <- IfAddrs]).
 1885: 
 1886: is_good_addr(Addr, inet) when tuple_size(Addr) =:= 4 ->
 1887:     true;
 1888: is_good_addr({0,0,0,0,0,16#ffff,_,_}, inet6) ->
 1889:     false; %% ipv4 mapped
 1890: is_good_addr({16#fe80,_,_,_,_,_,_,_}, inet6) ->
 1891:     false; %% link-local
 1892: is_good_addr(Addr, inet6) when tuple_size(Addr) =:= 8 ->
 1893:     true;
 1894: is_good_addr(_Addr, _Family) ->
 1895:     false.
 1896: 
 1897: ipv4_map_addrs(InetAddrs) ->
 1898:     [begin
 1899: 	 <<AB:16>> = <<A,B>>,
 1900: 	 <<CD:16>> = <<C,D>>,
 1901: 	 {0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 16#ffff, AB, CD}
 1902:      end || {A,B,C,D} <- InetAddrs].
 1903: 
 1904: do_open_and_connect(ServerAddresses, AddressToConnectTo) ->
 1905:     Fun = fun (_, _, _, _, _, _) -> ok end,
 1906:     do_open_and_connect(ServerAddresses, AddressToConnectTo, Fun).
 1907: %%
 1908: do_open_and_connect(ServerAddresses, AddressToConnectTo, Fun) ->
 1909:     {ServerFamily, ServerOpts} = get_family_by_addrs(ServerAddresses),
 1910:     io:format("Serving ~p addresses: ~p~n",
 1911: 	      [ServerFamily, ServerAddresses]),
 1912:     S1 = ok(gen_sctp:open(0, [{ip,Addr} || Addr <- ServerAddresses] ++
 1913: 			      [ServerFamily|ServerOpts])),
 1914:     ok = gen_sctp:listen(S1, true),
 1915:     P1 = ok(inet:port(S1)),
 1916:     ClientFamily = get_family_by_addr(AddressToConnectTo),
 1917:     io:format("Connecting to ~p ~p~n",
 1918: 	      [ClientFamily, AddressToConnectTo]),
 1919:     ClientOpts =
 1920: 	[ClientFamily |
 1921: 	 case ClientFamily of
 1922: 	     inet6 ->
 1923: 		 [{ipv6_v6only,true}];
 1924: 	     _ ->
 1925: 		 []
 1926: 	 end],
 1927:     S2 = ok(gen_sctp:open(0, ClientOpts)),
 1928:     log(open),
 1929:     %% Verify client can connect
 1930:     #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up} = S2Assoc =
 1931: 	ok(gen_sctp:connect(S2, AddressToConnectTo, P1, [])),
 1932:     log(comm_up),
 1933:     %% verify server side also receives comm_up from client
 1934:     S1Assoc = recv_comm_up_eventually(S1),
 1935:     Result = Fun(S1, ServerFamily, S1Assoc, S2, ClientFamily, S2Assoc),
 1936:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S2),
 1937:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S1),
 1938:     Result.
 1939: 
 1940: %% If at least one of the addresses is an ipv6 address, return inet6, else inet.
 1941: get_family_by_addrs(Addresses) ->
 1942:     case lists:usort([get_family_by_addr(Addr) || Addr <- Addresses]) of
 1943: 	[inet, inet6] -> {inet6, [{ipv6_v6only, false}]};
 1944: 	[inet]        -> {inet,  []};
 1945: 	[inet6]       -> {inet6, []}
 1946:     end.
 1947: 
 1948: get_family_by_addr(Addr) when tuple_size(Addr) =:= 4 -> inet;
 1949: get_family_by_addr(Addr) when tuple_size(Addr) =:= 8 -> inet6.
 1950: 
 1951: recv_comm_up_eventually(S) ->
 1952:     case ok(gen_sctp:recv(S)) of
 1953: 	{_Addr, _Port, _Info,
 1954: 	 #sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up} = Assoc} ->
 1955: 	    Assoc;
 1956: 	{_Addr, _Port, _Info, _OtherSctpMsg} = Msg ->
 1957: 	    log({unexpected,Msg}),
 1958: 	    recv_comm_up_eventually(S)
 1959:     end.
 1960: 
 1961: 
 1962: %% 
 1963: recv_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1964:     ?P("create server socket (and listen)"),
 1965:     {ok, S} = gen_sctp:open(),
 1966:     gen_sctp:listen(S, true),
 1967:     {ok, SPort} = inet:port(S),
 1968: 
 1969:     ?P("create client socket (and connect)"),
 1970:     {ok, C} = gen_sctp:open(),
 1971:     {ok, _} = gen_sctp:connect(C, localhost, SPort, []),
 1972: 
 1973:     TC = self(),
 1974:     RECV = fun() ->
 1975:                    ?P("try setup recv(s)"),
 1976:                    ok = recv_close_setup_recv(S),
 1977:                    ?P("announce ready"),
 1978:                    TC ! {self(), ready},
 1979:                    ?P("try data recv"),
 1980:                    Res = gen_sctp:recv(S),
 1981:                    ?P("recv res: "
 1982:                       "~n   ~p", [Res]),
 1983:                    exit(Res)
 1984:            end,
 1985:     ?P("spawn reader - then await reader ready"),
 1986:     {Pid, MRef} = spawn_monitor(RECV),
 1987:     receive
 1988:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, PreReason} ->
 1989:             %% Make sure it does not die for some other reason...
 1990:             ?P("unexpected reader termination:"
 1991:                "~n   ~p", [PreReason]),
 1992:             (catch gen_sctp:close(S)),
 1993:             (catch gen_sctp:close(C)),
 1994:             ct:fail("Unexpected pre close from reader (~p): ~p",
 1995:                           [Pid, PreReason]);
 1996:         {Pid, ready} ->
 1997:             ?P("reader ready"),
 1998:             ok
 1999:     after 30000 -> % Just in case...
 2000:             %% This is **extreme**, but there is no way to know
 2001:             %% how long it will take to iterate through all the
 2002:             %% addresses of a host...
 2003:             ?P("reader ready timeout"),
 2004:             (catch gen_sctp:close(S)),
 2005:             (catch gen_sctp:close(C)),
 2006:             ct:fail("Unexpected pre close timeout (~p)", [Pid])
 2007:     end,
 2008: 
 2009:     ?P("\"ensure\" reader reading..."),
 2010:     receive
 2011:         Any ->
 2012:             ?P("Received unexpected message: "
 2013:                "~n   ~p", [Any]),
 2014:             (catch gen_sctp:close(S)),
 2015:             (catch gen_sctp:close(C)),
 2016:             ct:fail("Unexpected message: ~p", [Any])
 2017:     after 5000 ->
 2018:             ok
 2019:     end,
 2020: 
 2021:     ?P("close server socket"),
 2022:     ok = gen_sctp:close(S),
 2023:     ?P("await reader termination"),
 2024:     receive
 2025:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, {error, closed}} ->
 2026:             ?P("expected reader termination result"),
 2027:             (catch gen_sctp:close(C)),
 2028:             ok;
 2029:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, PostReason} ->
 2030:             ?P("unexpected reader termination: "
 2031:                "~n   ~p", [PostReason]),
 2032:             (catch gen_sctp:close(C)),
 2033:             ct:fail("Unexpected post close from reader (~p): ~p",
 2034:                           [Pid, PostReason])
 2035:     after 5000 ->
 2036:             ?P("unexpected reader termination timeout"),
 2037:             demonitor(MRef, [flush]),
 2038:             (catch gen_sctp:close(C)),
 2039:             exit(Pid, kill),
 2040:             ct:fail("Reader (~p) termination timeout", [Pid])
 2041:     end,
 2042:     ?P("close client socket"),
 2043:     (catch gen_sctp:close(C)),
 2044:     ?P("done"),
 2045:     ok.
 2046: 
 2047: 
 2048: recv_close_setup_recv(S) ->
 2049:     recv_close_setup_recv(S, 1).
 2050: 
 2051: recv_close_setup_recv(S, N) ->
 2052:     ?P("try setup recv ~w", [N]),
 2053:     case gen_sctp:recv(S, 5000) of
 2054:         {ok, {Addr,
 2055:               Port,
 2056:               _AncData, 
 2057:               Data}} when is_tuple(Addr) andalso is_integer(Port) ->
 2058:             ?P("setup recv ~w: "
 2059:                "~n   ~p", [N, Data]),
 2060:             recv_close_setup_recv(S, N+1);
 2061:         {error, timeout} ->
 2062:             ok
 2063:     end.
 2064: 
 2065: 
 2066: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2067: 
 2068: %% This is the most basic of (sockaddr) tests.
 2069: 
 2070: t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2071:     ct:timetrap(?MINS(1)),
 2072:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 2073:             fun() -> ok end,
 2074:             fun() ->
 2075:                     Domain = inet,
 2076:                     LocalAddr =
 2077:                         case ?LIB:which_local_addr(Domain) of
 2078:                             {ok, LA} ->
 2079:                                 LA;
 2080:                             {error, _} ->
 2081:                                 skip("No local address")
 2082:                         end,
 2083:                     SockAddr = #{family   => Domain,
 2084:                                  addr     => LocalAddr,
 2085:                                  port     => 0},
 2086:                     do_simple_sockaddr_send_recv(SockAddr, Config)
 2087:             end).
 2088: 
 2089: t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2090:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 2091:             fun() -> ok end,
 2092:             fun() ->
 2093:                     Domain = inet,
 2094:                     LinkLocalAddr =
 2095:                         case ?LIB:which_link_local_addr(Domain) of
 2096:                             {ok, LLA} ->
 2097:                                 LLA;
 2098:                             {error, _} ->
 2099:                                 skip("No link local address")
 2100:                         end,
 2101:                     SockAddr = #{family => Domain,
