 2102:                                  addr   => LinkLocalAddr,
 2103:                                  port   => 0},
 2104:                     do_simple_sockaddr_send_recv(SockAddr, Config)
 2105:             end).
 2106: 
 2107: 
 2108: t_simple_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2109:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 2110:             fun() -> ?LIB:has_support_ipv6() end,
 2111:             fun() ->
 2112:                     Domain = inet6,
 2113:                     LocalAddr =
 2114:                         case ?LIB:which_local_addr(Domain) of
 2115:                             {ok, LA} ->
 2116:                                 LA;
 2117:                         {error, _} ->
 2118:                             skip("No local address")
 2119:                     end,
 2120:                     SockAddr = #{family   => Domain,
 2121:                                  addr     => LocalAddr,
 2122:                                  port     => 0},
 2123:                     do_simple_sockaddr_send_recv(SockAddr, Config)
 2124:             end).
 2125: 
 2126: 
 2127: t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2128:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 2129:             fun() ->
 2130:                     ?LIB:has_support_ipv6(),
 2131:                     is_net_supported(),
 2132:                     is_not_freebsd()
 2133:             end,
 2134:             fun() ->
 2135:                     Domain = inet6,
 2136:                     LinkLocalAddr =
 2137:                         case ?LIB:which_link_local_addr(Domain) of
 2138:                             {ok, LLA} ->
 2139:                                 LLA;
 2140:                             {error, _} ->
 2141:                                 skip("No link local address")
 2142:                         end,
 2143:                     Filter =
 2144:                         fun(#{addr := #{family := D,
 2145:                                         addr   := A}} = C) ->
 2146:                                 if
 2147:                                     (D =:= Domain) andalso
 2148:                                     (A =:= LinkLocalAddr) ->
 2149:                                         ?P("found link-local candidate: "
 2150:                                            "~n   ~p", [C]),
 2151:                                         true;
 2152:                                     true ->
 2153:                                         false
 2154:                                 end;                                        
 2155:                            (_) ->
 2156:                                 false
 2157:                         end,
 2158:                     case net:getifaddrs(Filter) of
 2159:                         {ok, [#{addr := #{scope_id := ScopeID}} = H|T]} ->
 2160:                             ?P("found link-local candidate(s): "
 2161:                                "~n   Candidate:         ~p"
 2162:                                "~n   Rest Candidate(s): ~p", [H, T]),
 2163:                             SockAddr = #{family   => Domain,
 2164:                                          addr     => LinkLocalAddr,
 2165:                                          port     => 0,
 2166:                                          scope_id => ScopeID},
 2167:                             do_simple_sockaddr_send_recv(SockAddr, Config);
 2168:                         {ok, _} ->
 2169:                             skip("Scope ID not found");
 2170:                         {error, R} ->
 2171:                             skip({failed_getifaddrs, R})
 2172:                     end
 2173:             end).
 2174: 
 2175: do_simple_sockaddr_send_recv(#{family := _Fam} = SockAddr, _) ->
 2176:     %% Create the server
 2177:     Self   = self(),
 2178:     ?P("~n      SockAddr: ~p", [SockAddr]),
 2179:     ServerF = fun() ->
 2180:                       ?P("[server] try create (open) listen socket"),
 2181:                       Sock =
 2182:                           try gen_sctp:open([{ifaddr, SockAddr},
 2183:                                              {active, true},
 2184:                                              binary]) of
 2185:                               {ok, S} ->
 2186:                                   S;
 2187:                               {error, OReason} ->
 2188:                                   ?P("open error: "
 2189:                                      "~n      Reason: ~p", [OReason]),
 2190:                                   exit({open_error, OReason})
 2191:                           catch
 2192:                               OC:OE:OS ->
 2193:                                   ?P("open failure: "
 2194:                                      "~n      Error Class: ~p"
 2195:                                      "~n      Error:       ~p"
 2196:                                      "~n      Call Stack:  ~p", [OC, OE, OS]),
 2197:                                   exit({open_failure, {OC, OE, OS}})
 2198:                           end,
 2199: 
 2200:                       ?P("[server] try make 'listen' socket"),
 2201:                       ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sock, true),
 2202: 
 2203:                       ?P("[server] try get port number"),
 2204:                       {ok, Port}  = inet:port(Sock),
 2205:                       ?P("[server] port: ~w", [Port]),
 2206:                       Self ! {{port, Port}, self()},
 2207: 
 2208: 
 2209:                       ?P("try accept (await 'accept' message)"),
 2210:                       AssocID1 =
 2211:                           receive
 2212:                               {sctp,
 2213:                                Sock,
 2214:                                FromIP11, FromPort11,
 2215:                                {ANC1, #sctp_assoc_change{state            = comm_up,
 2216:                                                          error            = 0,
 2217:                                                          outbound_streams = OutStreams1,
 2218:                                                          inbound_streams  = InStreams1,
 2219:                                                          assoc_id         = AID1}}} ->
 2220:                                   ?P("[server] received assoc - accepted: "
 2221:                                      "~n      From IP:     ~p"
 2222:                                      "~n      From Port:   ~p"
 2223:                                      "~n      ANC:         ~p"
 2224:                                      "~n      Out Streams: ~p"
 2225:                                      "~n      In Streams:  ~p"
 2226:                                      "~n      Assoc ID:    ~p",
 2227:                                      [FromIP11, FromPort11, ANC1,
 2228:                                       OutStreams1, InStreams1, AID1]),
 2229:                                   AID1
 2230:                           end,
 2231: 
 2232:                       ?P("[server] await message 2"),
 2233:                       receive
 2234:                           {sctp, Sock, FromIP12, FromPort12, {_, <<"hej">>}} ->
 2235:                               ?P("[server] received expected message 1: "
 2236:                                  "~n      FromIP2:   ~p"
 2237:                                  "~n      FromPort2: ~p"
 2238:                                  "~n      => send reply", [FromIP12, FromPort12]),
 2239:                               ok = gen_sctp:send(Sock, AssocID1, 1, "hopp")
 2240:                       end,
 2241: 
 2242: 
 2243:                       ?P("try accept (await 'accept' message)"),
 2244:                       AssocID2 =
 2245:                           receive
 2246:                               {sctp,
 2247:                                Sock,
 2248:                                FromIP21, FromPort21,
 2249:                                {ANC2, #sctp_assoc_change{state            = comm_up,
 2250:                                                          error            = 0,
 2251:                                                          outbound_streams = OutStreams2,
 2252:                                                          inbound_streams  = InStreams2,
 2253:                                                          assoc_id         = AID2}}} ->
 2254:                                   ?P("[server] received assoc - accepted: "
 2255:                                      "~n      FromIP:      ~p"
 2256:                                      "~n      FromPort:    ~p"
 2257:                                      "~n      ANC:         ~p"
 2258:                                      "~n      Out Streams: ~p"
 2259:                                      "~n      In Streams:  ~p"
 2260:                                      "~n      Assoc ID:    ~p",
 2261:                                      [FromIP21, FromPort21, ANC2,
 2262:                                       OutStreams2, InStreams2, AID2]),
 2263:                                   AID2
 2264:                           end,
 2265: 
 2266:                       ?P("[server] await message 1"),
 2267:                       receive
 2268:                           {sctp, Sock, FromIP22, FromPort22, {_, <<"hej">>}} ->
 2269:                               ?P("[server] received expected message 1: "
 2270:                                  "~n      From IP:   ~p"
 2271:                                  "~n      From Port: ~p"
 2272:                                  "~n      => send reply", [FromIP22, FromPort22]),
 2273:                               ok = gen_sctp:send(Sock, AssocID2, 1, "hopp")
 2274:                       end,
 2275: 
 2276: 
 2277:                       ?P("[server] await termination command"),
 2278:                       receive
 2279:                           {die, Self} ->
 2280:                               ?P("[server] terminating"),
 2281:                               (catch gen_tcp:close(Sock)),
 2282:                               exit(normal)
 2283:                       end
 2284:               end,
 2285:     ?P("try start server"),
 2286:     Server = spawn_link(ServerF),
 2287:     ?P("server started - await port "),
 2288:     ServerPort = receive
 2289:                      {{port, Port}, Server} ->
 2290:                          Port;
 2291:                      {'EXIT', Server, Reason} ->
 2292:                          ?P("server died unexpectedly: "
 2293:                             "~n      ~p", [Reason]),
 2294:                          exit({unexpected_server_failure, Reason})
 2295:                  end,
 2296:     ?P("server port received: ~p", [ServerPort]),
 2297:     
 2298: 
 2299:     ?P("try create client socket 1"),
 2300:     {ok, CSock1} = gen_sctp:open([{ifaddr, SockAddr},
 2301:                                   {active, true},
 2302:                                   binary]),
 2303: 
 2304:     ?P("client socket 1: "
 2305:        "~n      CSock: ~p"
 2306:        "~n      CPort: ~p", [CSock1, inet:port(CSock1)]),
 2307: 
 2308:     ?P("try connect client socket 1"),
 2309:     ServerSockAddr = SockAddr#{port => ServerPort},
 2310:     {COutStreams1, CInStreams1, CAssocID1} =
 2311:         case gen_sctp:connect(CSock1, ServerSockAddr, [], ?SECS(1)) of
 2312:             {ok, #sctp_assoc_change{state            = comm_up,
 2313:                                     error            = 0,
 2314:                                     outbound_streams = COS1,
 2315:                                     inbound_streams  = CIS1,
 2316:                                     assoc_id         = CAID1}} ->
 2317:                 {COS1, CIS1, CAID1};
 2318:             {ok, Unexpected1} ->
 2319:                 ?P("<ERROR> unexpected connect (1) result: "
 2320:                    "~n      ~p", [Unexpected1]),
 2321:                 ct:fail({unexpected_client_connect_result, 1, Unexpected1});
 2322:             {error, Reason1} ->
 2323:                 ?P("<ERROR> failed client 1 connect: "
 2324:                    "~n      Reason: ~p", [Reason1]),
 2325:                 ct:fail({client_connect_failed, 1, Reason1})
 2326:         end,
 2327: 
 2328:     ?P("client 1 connected: "
 2329:        "~n      Out Streams: ~p"
 2330:        "~n      In Streams:  ~p"
 2331:        "~n      Assoc ID:    ~p", [COutStreams1, CInStreams1, CAssocID1]),
 2332: 
 2333:     ?P("[client 1] try send message"),
 2334:     ok = gen_sctp:send(CSock1, CAssocID1, 1, "hej"),
 2335: 
 2336:     ?P("[client 1] await reply message"),
 2337:     receive
 2338:         {sctp, CSock1, _, _, {_, <<"hopp">>}} ->
 2339:             ?P("received expected reply message")
 2340:     end,
 2341: 
 2342: 
 2343:     ?P("[client 2] try create client socket"),
 2344:     {ok, CSock2} = gen_sctp:open([{ifaddr, SockAddr},
 2345:                                   {active, true},
 2346:                                   binary]),
 2347: 
 2348:     ?P("[client 2] client socket: "
 2349:        "~n      CSock: ~p"
 2350:        "~n      CPort: ~p", [CSock2, inet:port(CSock2)]),
 2351: 
 2352:     ?P("[client 2] try connect-init"),
 2353:     ServerSockAddr = SockAddr#{port => ServerPort},
 2354:     case gen_sctp:connect_init(CSock2, ServerSockAddr, []) of
 2355:         ok ->
 2356:             ok;
 2357:         {error, Reason2} ->
 2358:             ?P("<ERROR> failed client 2 connect: "
 2359:                "~n      Reason: ~p", [Reason2]),
 2360:             ct:fail({client_connect_failed, 2, Reason2})
 2361:     end,
 2362: 
 2363:     ?P("[client 2] await connect completion"),
 2364:     CAssocID2 =
 2365:         receive
 2366:             {sctp,
 2367:              CSock2,
 2368:              CFromIP2, CFromPort2,
 2369:              {CANC2, #sctp_assoc_change{state            = comm_up,
 2370:                                         error            = 0,
 2371:                                         outbound_streams = COutStreams2,
 2372:                                         inbound_streams  = CInStreams2,
 2373:                                         assoc_id         = CAID2}}} ->
 2374:                 ?P("[client 2] connected: "
 2375:                    "~n      From IP:     ~p"
 2376:                    "~n      From Port:   ~p"
 2377:                    "~n      ANC:         ~p"
 2378:                    "~n      Out Streams: ~p"
 2379:                    "~n      In Streams:  ~p"
 2380:                    "~n      Assoc ID:    ~p",
 2381:                    [CFromIP2, CFromPort2, CANC2,
 2382:                     COutStreams2, CInStreams2, CAID2]),
 2383:                 CAID2
 2384:         end,
 2385: 
 2386:     ?P("[client 2] try send message"),
 2387:     ok = gen_sctp:send(CSock2, CAssocID2, 1, "hej"),
 2388: 
 2389:     ?P("[client 2] await reply message"),
 2390:     receive
 2391:         {sctp, CSock2, _, _, {_, <<"hopp">>}} ->
 2392:             ?P("[client 2] received expected reply message")
 2393:     end,
 2394: 
 2395: 
 2396:     ?P("terminate server"),
 2397:     Server ! {die, self()},
 2398: 
 2399:     ?P("await server termination"),
 2400:     receive
 2401:         {'EXIT', Server, normal} ->
 2402:             ok
 2403:     end,
 2404:     
 2405:     ?P("cleanup"),
 2406:     (catch gen_sctp:close(CSock1)),
 2407:     (catch gen_sctp:close(CSock2)),
 2408: 
 2409:     ?P("done"),
 2410:     ok.
 2411: 
 2412:     
 2413: %% Test the sockaddr version of connectx_init/4.
 2414: t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_connectx_init(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2415:     Localhost = {127,0,0,1},
 2416:     {ok,Sb} = gen_sctp:open(),
 2417:     {ok,Pb} = inet:port(Sb),
 2418:     {ok,Sa} = gen_sctp:open(),
 2419:     SockAddr = #{family   => inet,
 2420:                  addr     => Localhost,
 2421:                  port     => Pb},
 2422:     case gen_sctp:connectx_init(Sa, [SockAddr], []) of
 2423:         {ok, A1} ->
 2424: 	    true = (A1 =/= 0),
 2425:             {Localhost,Pb,#sctp_assoc_change{state=cant_assoc, assoc_id = A1}} =
 2426:                 recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity))),
 2427:             ok = gen_sctp:listen(Sb, true),
 2428:             {ok, A2} = gen_sctp:connectx_init(Sa, [SockAddr], []),
 2429: 	    true = (A2 =/= 0),
 2430:             {Localhost,Pb,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up, assoc_id = A2}} =
 2431:                 recv_event(log_ok(gen_sctp:recv(Sa, infinity))),
 2432:             ok = gen_sctp:close(Sa),
 2433:             ok = gen_sctp:close(Sb);
 2434:         {error, enotsup} ->
 2435:             ok
 2436:     end,
 2437:     ok.
 2438: 
 2439: 
 2440: %%% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2441: 
 2442: socket_pair_open(Addr, StartTime, Timeout) ->
 2443:     S1 = socket_open([{ip,Addr}], Timeout),
 2444:     ?LOGVAR(S1),
 2445:     P1 = socket_call(S1, get_port),
 2446:     ?LOGVAR(P1),
 2447:     ok = socket_call(S1, {listen,true}),
 2448:     S2 = socket_open([{ip,Addr}], Timeout),
 2449:     ?LOGVAR(S2),
 2450:     P2 = socket_call(S2, get_port),
 2451:     ?LOGVAR(P2),
 2452:     %%
 2453:     socket_call(S2, {connect_init,Addr,P1,[]}),
 2454:     S2Ai =
 2455: 	receive
 2456: 	    {S2,{Addr,P1,
 2457: 		 #sctp_assoc_change{
 2458: 		    state=comm_up,
 2459: 		    assoc_id=S2AssocId}}} -> S2AssocId
 2460: 	after Timeout ->
 2461: 		socket_bailout([S1,S2], StartTime)
 2462: 	end,
 2463:     S1Ai =
 2464: 	receive
 2465: 	    {S1,{Addr,P2,
 2466: 		 #sctp_assoc_change{
 2467: 		    state=comm_up,
 2468: 		    assoc_id=S1AssocId}}} -> S1AssocId
 2469: 	after Timeout ->
 2470: 		socket_bailout([S1,S2], StartTime)
 2471: 	end,
 2472:     {{S1,P1,S1Ai}, {S2,P2,S2Ai}}.
 2473: 
 2474: socket_pair_close(Addr, StartTime, Timeout, {{S1,P1,_S1Ai}, {S2,_P2,S2Ai}}) ->
 2475:     socket_close_verbose(S1, StartTime),
 2476:     receive
 2477: 	{S2,{Addr,P1,#sctp_shutdown_event{assoc_id=S2Ai}}} -> ok
 2478:     after Timeout ->
 2479: 	    socket_bailout([S2], StartTime)
 2480:     end,
 2481:     receive
 2482: 	{S2,{Addr,P1,#sctp_assoc_change{state=shutdown_comp,
 2483: 					assoc_id=S2Ai}}} -> ok
 2484:     after Timeout ->
 2485: 	    socket_bailout([S2], StartTime)
 2486:     end,
 2487:     socket_close_verbose(S2, StartTime),
 2488:     [] = flush(),
 2489:     ok.
 2490: 
 2491: %%% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2492: %%% socket gen_server ultra light
 2493: 
 2494: socket_open(SockOpts0, Timeout) ->
 2495:     SockOpts =
 2496: 	case lists:keyfind(active,1,SockOpts0) of
 2497: 	    false ->
 2498: 		[{active,once}|SockOpts0];
 2499: 	    _ ->
 2500: 		SockOpts0
 2501: 	end,
 2502:     Opts = [{type,seqpacket},binary|SockOpts],
 2503:     Starter =
 2504: 	fun () ->
 2505: 		{ok,Socket} =
 2506: 		    gen_sctp:open(Opts),
 2507: 		Socket
 2508: 	end,
 2509:     s_start(Starter, Timeout).
 2510: 
 2511: socket_peeloff(Socket, AssocId, SocketOpts, Timeout) ->
 2512:     Opts = [binary|SocketOpts],
 2513:     Starter =
 2514: 	fun () ->
 2515: 		{ok,NewSocket} =
 2516: 		    gen_sctp:peeloff(Socket, AssocId),
 2517: 		ok = inet:setopts(NewSocket, Opts),
 2518: 		NewSocket
 2519: 	end,
 2520:     s_start(Starter, Timeout).
 2521: 
 2522: socket_close_verbose(S, StartTime) ->
 2523:     History = socket_history(socket_close(S), StartTime),
 2524:     io:format("socket_close ~p:~n    ~p.~n", [S,History]),
 2525:     History.
 2526: 
 2527: socket_close(S) ->
 2528:     s_req(S, close).
 2529: 
 2530: socket_controlling_process(S, Pid) when is_pid(Pid) ->
 2531:     s_req(S, {controlling_process, Pid}).
 2532: 
 2533: socket_call(S, Request) ->
 2534:     s_req(S, {Request}).
 2535: 
 2536: %% socket_get(S, Key) ->
 2537: %%     s_req(S, {get,Key}).
 2538: 
 2539: socket_bailout([S|Ss], StartTime) ->
 2540:     History = socket_history(socket_close(S), StartTime),
 2541:     io:format("bailout ~p:~n    ~p.~n", [S,History]),
 2542:     socket_bailout(Ss, StartTime);
 2543: socket_bailout([], _) ->
 2544:     io:format("flush: ~p.~n", [flush()]),
 2545:     try throw(socket_bailout)
 2546:     catch throw : Reason : Stacktrace ->
 2547:             io:format("Stacktrace:~n    ~p.~n", [Stacktrace]),
 2548:             ct:fail(Reason)
 2549:     end, ok.
 2550: 
 2551: socket_history({State,Flush}, StartTime) ->
 2552:     {lists:keysort(
 2553:        2,
 2554:        lists:flatten(
 2555: 	 [[{Key,{TS-StartTime,Val}} || {TS,Val} <- Vals]
 2556: 	  || {Key,Vals} <- gb_trees:to_list(State)])),
 2557:      Flush}.
 2558: 
 2559: s_req(S, Req) ->
 2560:     AMref = erlang:monitor(process, S, [{alias, reply_demonitor}]),
 2561:     S ! {?MODULE, AMref, Req},
 2562:     receive
 2563:         {'DOWN', AMref, _, _, Error} ->
 2564:             exit(Error);
 2565:         {?MODULE, AMref, Reply} ->
 2566:             Reply
 2567:     end.
 2568: 
 2569: s_handle_req(Socket, Req) ->
 2570:     case Req of
 2571:         {listen,Listen} ->
 2572: 	    ok = gen_sctp:listen(Socket, Listen);
 2573: 	get_port ->
 2574: 	    ok(inet:port(Socket));
 2575: 	get_socket ->
 2576: 	    Socket;
 2577: 	{connect_init,ConAddr,ConPort,ConOpts} ->
 2578: 	    ok = gen_sctp:connect_init(Socket, ConAddr, ConPort, ConOpts);
 2579: 	{send,AssocId,Stream,Data} ->
 2580: 	    ok = gen_sctp:send(Socket, AssocId, Stream, Data);
 2581: 	{send,OtherSocket,AssocId,Stream,Data} ->
 2582: 	    ok = gen_sctp:send(OtherSocket, AssocId, Stream, Data);
 2583: 	{setopts,Opts} ->
 2584: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Socket, Opts);
 2585: 	{getopts,Optnames} ->
 2586: 	    ok(inet:getopts(Socket, Optnames))
 2587:     end.
 2588: 
 2589: s_start(Starter, Timeout) ->
 2590:     Parent = self(),
 2591:     spawn_link(
 2592:       fun () ->
 2593:               try
 2594:                   Socket = Starter(),
 2595:                   s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, gb_trees:empty())
 2596:               catch
 2597:                   Class:Reason:Stacktrace ->
 2598:                       io:format(?MODULE_STRING":socket exception ~w:~w at~n"
 2599:                                 "~p.~n", [Class,Reason,Stacktrace]),
 2600:                       erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2601:               end
 2602:       end).
 2603: 
 2604: s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, State) ->
 2605:     receive
 2606: 	{?MODULE,AMref,{controlling_process, NewParent}} ->
 2607: 	    AMref ! {?MODULE,AMref,ok},
 2608: 	    s_loop(Socket, Timeout, NewParent, State);
 2609: 	{?MODULE,AMref,close} -> % socket_close()
 2610: 	    erlang:send_after(Timeout, self(), {?MODULE,AMref,exit}),
 2611: 	    s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, State);
 2612: 	{?MODULE,AMref,exit} ->
 2613: 	    ok = gen_sctp:close(Socket),
 2614: 	    NewState = gb_push(exit, Socket, State),
 2615: 	    AMref ! {?MODULE,AMref,{NewState,flush()}};
 2616: 	{?MODULE,AMref,{Req}} ->
 2617:             Result = s_handle_req(Socket, Req),
 2618: 	    NewState = gb_push(req, {Req,Result}, State),
 2619: 	    AMref ! {?MODULE, AMref,Result},
 2620: 	    s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, NewState);
 2621: 	%% {Parent,AMref,{get,Key}} ->
 2622: 	%%     AMref ! {?MODULE,AMref,gb_get(Key, State)},
 2623: 	%%     s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, State);
 2624: 	{sctp,Socket,Addr,Port,
 2625: 	 {[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{stream=Stream,assoc_id=AssocId}=SRI],Data}}
 2626: 	  when not is_tuple(Data) ->
 2627: 	    case gb_get({assoc_change,AssocId}, State) of
 2628: 		[{Addr,Port,
 2629: 		  #sctp_assoc_change{
 2630: 		     state=comm_up,
 2631: 		     inbound_streams=Is}}|_]
 2632: 		  when 0 =< Stream, Stream < Is-> ok;
 2633: 		[] -> ok
 2634: 	    end,
 2635: 	    Key = {msg,AssocId,Stream},
 2636: 	    NewState = gb_push(Key, {Addr,Port,SRI,Data}, State),
 2637: 	    Parent ! {self(),{Addr,Port,AssocId,Stream,Data}},
 2638: 	    again(Socket),
 2639: 	    s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, NewState);
 2640: 	{sctp,Socket,Addr,Port,
 2641: 	 {SRI,#sctp_assoc_change{assoc_id=AssocId,state=St}=SAC}} ->
 2642: 	    case SRI of
 2643: 		[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=AssocId,stream=0}] -> ok;
 2644: 		[] -> ok
 2645: 	    end,
 2646: 	    Key = {assoc_change,AssocId},
 2647: 	    case {gb_get(Key, State),St} of
 2648: 		{[],_} -> ok;
 2649: 		{[{Addr,Port,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up}}|_],_}
 2650: 		  when St =:= comm_lost; St =:= shutdown_comp -> ok
 2651: 	    end,
 2652: 	    NewState = gb_push(Key, {Addr,Port,SAC}, State),
 2653: 	    Parent ! {self(),{Addr,Port,SAC}},
 2654: 	    again(Socket),
 2655: 	    s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, NewState);
 2656: 	{sctp,Socket,Addr,Port,
 2657: 	 {SRI,#sctp_paddr_change{assoc_id=AssocId,
 2658: 				 addr={_,P},
 2659: 				 state=St}=SPC}} ->
 2660: 	    match_unless_solaris(Port, P),
 2661: 	    case SRI of
 2662: 		[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=AssocId,stream=0}] -> ok;
 2663: 		[] -> ok
 2664: 	    end,
 2665: 	    case {gb_get({assoc_change,AssocId}, State),St} of
 2666: 		{[{Addr,Port,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up}}|_],_}
 2667: 		  when St =:= addr_available;
 2668: 		       St =:= addr_confirmed -> ok;
 2669: 		{[],addr_confirmed} -> ok
 2670: 	    end,
 2671: 	    Key = {paddr_change,AssocId},
 2672: 	    NewState = gb_push(Key, {Addr,Port,SPC}, State),
 2673: 	    again(Socket),
 2674: 	    s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, NewState);
 2675: 	{sctp,Socket,Addr,Port,
 2676: 	 {SRI,#sctp_shutdown_event{assoc_id=AssocId}=SSE}} ->
 2677: 	    case SRI of
 2678: 		[#sctp_sndrcvinfo{assoc_id=AssocId,stream=0}] -> ok;
 2679: 		[] -> ok
 2680: 	    end,
 2681: 	    case gb_get({assoc_change,AssocId}, State) of
 2682: 		[{Addr,Port,#sctp_assoc_change{state=comm_up}}|_] -> ok;
 2683: 		[] -> ok
 2684: 	    end,
 2685: 	    Key = {shutdown_event,AssocId},
 2686: 	    NewState = gb_push(Key, {Addr,Port}, State),
 2687: 	    Parent ! {self(), {Addr,Port,SSE}},
 2688: 	    again(Socket),
 2689: 	    s_loop(Socket, Timeout, Parent, NewState);
 2690: 	Unexpected ->
 2691: 	    erlang:error({unexpected,Unexpected})
 2692:     end.
 2693: 
 2694: again(Socket) ->
 2695:     receive
 2696: 	{sctp_passive,Socket} ->
 2697: 	    [{active, false}] = ok(inet:getopts(Socket, [active])),
 2698: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Socket,[{active,1}])
 2699:     after 0 ->
 2700: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Socket, [{active,once}])
 2701:     end.
 2702: 
 2703: gb_push(Key, Val, GBT) ->
 2704:     TS = timestamp(),
 2705:     case gb_trees:lookup(Key, GBT) of
 2706: 	none ->
 2707: 	    gb_trees:insert(Key, [{TS,Val}], GBT);
 2708: 	{value,V} ->
 2709: 	    gb_trees:update(Key, [{TS,Val}|V], GBT)
 2710:     end.
 2711: 
 2712: gb_get(Key, GBT) ->
 2713:     case gb_trees:lookup(Key, GBT) of
 2714: 	none ->
 2715: 	    [];
 2716: 	{value,V} ->
 2717: 	    [Val || {_TS,Val} <- V]
 2718:     end.
 2719: 
 2720: match_unless_solaris(A, B) ->
 2721:     case os:type() of
 2722: 	{unix,sunos} -> B;
 2723: 	_ -> A = B
 2724:     end.
 2725: 
 2726: 
 2727: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2728: 
 2729: is_net_supported() ->
 2730:     try net:info() of
 2731:         #{} ->
 2732:             ok
 2733:     catch
 2734:         error : notsup ->
 2735:             not_supported(net)
 2736:     end.
 2737: 
 2738: 
 2739: is_not_freebsd() ->
 2740:     is_not_platform(freebsd, "FreeBSD").
 2741: 
 2742: is_not_platform(Platform, PlatformStr)
 2743:   when is_atom(Platform) andalso is_list(PlatformStr) ->
 2744:       case os:type() of
 2745:         {unix, Platform} ->
 2746:             skip("This does not work on " ++ PlatformStr);
 2747:         _ ->
 2748:             ok
 2749:     end.
 2750: 
 2751: 
 2752: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2753: 
 2754: timestamp() ->
 2755:     erlang:monotonic_time().
 2756: 
 2757: 
 2758: pi(Item) ->
 2759:     {Item, Val} = process_info(self(), Item),
 2760:     Val.
 2761:     
 2762: 
 2763: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2764: 
 2765: not_supported(What) ->
 2766:     skip({not_supported, What}).
 2767: 
 2768: skip(Reason) ->
 2769:     throw({skip, Reason}).
 2770: 
 2771: 
 2772: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2773: 
 2774: log_ok(X) ->
 2775:     log(ok(X)).
 2776: 
 2777: ok({ok, X}) ->
 2778:     X;
 2779: ok({error, X}) ->
 2780:     ?P("ERROR: ~p", [X]),
 2781:     ct:fail({unexpected_error, X});
 2782: ok(X) ->
 2783:     ?P("UNEXPECTED: ~p", [X]),
 2784:     ct:fail({unexpected, X}).
 2785:     
 2786: 
 2787: log(X) ->
 2788:     ?P("LOG: ~p", [X]),
 2789:     X.
 2790: 
 2791: err([], Result) ->
 2792:     erlang:error(Result);
 2793: err([Reason|_], {error,Reason}) ->
 2794:     ok;
 2795: err([_|Reasons], Result) ->
 2796:     err(Reasons, Result).
 2797: 
 2798: 
 2799: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2800: 
 2801: open_failed_str(Reason) ->
 2802:     ?F("Open failed: ~w", [Reason]).
 2803:
